The King Chapter 376: signs of chaos

Chapter 376 Signs of Chaos

"Governor, in addition to this matter, Earl Hudson also sent a lot of orc slaves, and exchanged labor for service with the small and medium nobles below. Do you want to stop it?"

Antonio asked concerned.

The work efficiency of orc slaves is definitely not as good as that of serfs. It is also a trouble to manage, otherwise it would have been popularized long ago.

"No need! It's too deliberate to block them on such a trivial matter, and the influence of spreading it is not good.

Besides, they notified us when the Korubians left a few days ago. Although the final harvest is very average, we have to respond to people's gestures.

They were all orc slaves anyway, and Earl Hudson would not feel bad if some died, so he arranged them in the most dangerous place. "

Governor Pierce said calmly.

This is an overt conspiracy, even if Hudson knew that he was wearing shoes, he couldn't say anything.

Slaves have no human rights, and orc slaves have even less human rights. It is only natural to arrange dirty work for them.

Under the original construction technology, some projects in dangerous areas are destined to be filled with life. It is better to fill it with the life of a beast than to fill it with the life of a human.

"Uncle, I heard that Earl Hudson will be the honorary headmaster of the Arcane Academy under construction in the kingdom. Do you think this will affect us?"

Viscount Cayo asked worriedly.

Just from the importance of all parties, it can be judged that the Arcane Academy under construction is not easy. Referring to the magic academy in the capital, Kayo knew that this thing would definitely affect the future political structure of the kingdom.

The competitor is not only the founder of the Arcane Academy, but also the honorary principal, but they just installed an ordinary teacher in it. The influence of the two parties on the academy is obviously not at the same level.

"Don't worry, the Arcane Academy has just been born, and it is the time when credibility is needed, and no one will make trouble at this time.

Hudson's character is still guaranteed. In all the time we've had with him, have you ever seen him play tricks?

Besides, the current Arcane Academy is not in his turn to make decisions. From the establishment of the college to the present, Hudson has done nothing except to hang a name.

It's not that he doesn't want to do it, but that those old guys hold the Arcane Academy too tightly. Even if Hudson, the honorary principal, doesn't have much say in the past.

Let's just watch, Hudson will definitely reach out to the Arcane Academy after those old guys are killed. "

After listening to what Governor Pierce said, Viscount Cayo was very helpless.

"Hudson's character is good?"

Looking back at his memory, he really didn't find any black spots. At least from the standpoint of the nobles of the human race, what Hudson has done is commendable.

Especially on the battlefield of the orcs, they obviously had the opportunity to attack them, but in the end, not only did they not make trouble, but they helped them at a critical moment.

What happened under the watchful eyes of the public cannot be blamed.

So much so that at the post-war noble meeting, the proposal on the Koslow family's entry into the circle of great nobles was directly passed by unanimous votes, including the Dalton family who bravely voted for it.

But this guy with good character, he made him miserable! Thinking of my previous sad experience, it was all tears.

But these things cannot be said to people yet. It is not clear how much impact it will have on Hudson's reputation, anyway, Viscount Cayo himself will definitely die.

…

Kingdom of Hesse.

"Your Majesty, Louis Vuitton III doesn't care about oil and salt. No matter what we say, he doesn't care."

Marquis Krasner said with a look of embarrassment.

Originally this was a trouble for the military, but the shrewd Marquis Lelian took the opportunity to blame it on the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The reason is very simple: these reckless people are only suitable for fighting and killing, and the negotiations should be left to professionals.

When it comes to this kind of talk, even if the Ministry of Foreign Affairs wants to shirk, there is no way to speak up, so it can only accept this trouble.

Perseverance, Louis Vuitton III is more difficult than they expected. Not only did coercion and lure not work, the officials sent out to negotiate were actually depressed by him.

Even if he is a prisoner, the king is still full of style. Coordination is impossible, now Louis Vuitton III only do one thing - eat, drink and have fun.

Outside the palace is the Hessian army, and inside the palace is still the territory of Louis Vuitton III. The treatment that the king deserves is not at all deducted.

It's not that they don't want to engage in petty tricks, but there are too many people staring at them. Everyone is smart, if Louis Vuitton III doesn't cooperate, it's just a little more trouble.

If drastic measures are used, something unexpected happens to Louis Vuitton III, and the charges of regicide will fall on them.

This kind of selective issue, not to mention the pressure of international public opinion, even their own king can't help but kill them.

"Trash!

Tell the Louis Vuitton **** that if he cooperates, he will be the fief earl of the kingdom. If he behaves well, I can give him a rich county as a fief.

If he continues to resist stubbornly, let him take his family out into exile and live a life of being dependent on others.

If you can't persuade them, then mobilize the members of the Korubia royal family to persuade them. His queen, prince, and princess were all sent over to let them go to work together! "

Alexander V said angrily.

This action against the Counties of Colombia has gone beyond the mark. If the aftermath is not dealt with properly, the international reputation of the Kingdom of Hesse will be negative.

It is never easy to annex a country legally. Especially for a country like the Counties of Colombia, which has not fought a single battle, there are many hidden dangers in its future rule.

If you can't swallow it raw, you can only increase the technical content. For example: the merger of the two countries proposed by Louis Vuitton III.

There is also a precedent for this kind of thing in the continent of Aslante. At present, several powerful countries on the mainland were formerly formed by a group of noble lords after the collapse of the empire.

Many great nobles with ancient inheritance, most of their ancestors have given birth to kings. Even if it has been independent for a short time, it has had a glorious history.

"Your Majesty, don't be angry. Louis Vuitton III really wanted to commit suicide, he was already dead. No matter how fast we act, we can't stop a person from committing suicide.

The current performance is nothing more than a bargain, wanting to fight for better treatment. We wanted a decent ending, so why didn't he?

At this moment, the real trouble for us to annex the Counties of Korubia is the scattered noble lords. If these people are not removed, the kingdom's local rule will never be peaceful! "

Prime Minister Milton said murderously.

It was just a loud clamor, but when it came time to deal with it, the situation changed again.

The territory of the nobles is sacred and inviolable. Without a suitable reason, even the king has no right to deprive them of their titles.

According to the normal rhythm of seizing titles, the king or governments at all levels have caught the major criminal evidence of the parties and submitted it to the noble council for confirmation before they can officially deprive them of titles.

This kind of game rule obviously does not apply to the Counties of Colombia. If you want to deprive one or two nobles of their titles, maybe you can do it.

It is no wonder that the local nobles can agree to the collective seizure of titles! I'm afraid that if the knives are put on the necks of the councilors, it is impossible for the local aristocratic council to pass.

During the non-war period, Alexander V did not dare to order the execution of nobles, even nobles from other countries.

It's even worse to keep these people. The Kingdom of Hesse took great risks to take military action in order to eat meat in the past, not a nominal ruling power.

A large number of domestic interest groups are all sharpening their knives and waiting to share the cake. If you suddenly say that the cake is gone, you can't explain it at all.

"What do you think should be done?"

Alexander V asked pretending not to know.

Generally speaking, to deal with diehards who cannot be attacked on the surface, they can only take extraordinary measures.

However, in this kind of thing, it is usually the people below who play their subjective initiative, and whether they succeed or fail, they must have nothing to do with the king.

"Your Majesty, the July Society has been entrenched in the Counties of Korubia for a long time and is plotting to launch a rebellion.

We used to help suppress the rebellion, but the nobles of Korubia didn't appreciate it. If the master does not agree, it is not good for us to forcefully enter their territory.

Now that the matter is leaked, I am afraid that July will take the risk and launch a rebellion in advance to attack the king of the Counties of Korubia.

For the sake of the overall situation, please order the troops that entered the Counties of Colombia to gather in the capital to protect the safety of Louis Vuitton III. "

Count Nicholas suggested with a serious face.

For this kind of thing, the military must stand up and take responsibility, and it cannot be related to the king.

"Let the Marquis of Lelian figure it out! Everything is based on maintaining the long-term stability of Korubia."

The words of Alexander V directly settled the matter. If you want long-term peace and stability in Korubia, you must first cleanse the unstable factors.

It's just that the July Society suffered a lot. Even though people were still active in the northern part of the Alpha Kingdom, a scapegoat fell from the sky.

And it's not enough if you don't memorize it, there will be countless evidence and black materials pointing to them, proving that they did all the bad things.

Of course, for the July Club, which is thousands of miles away, it is completely a matter of having too many lice and not itching, and taking the blame can only be regarded as a daily operation.

In the past years, they have resisted countless crimes, and this time is nothing more than adding another one.

As for cult organizations, no one is clean. Especially the cult organization that has made a name for itself, they are all scapegoats.

…

Holy Mountain.

"Your Majesty, the Ruthenians have rejected our goodwill, they are only willing to lend a road, and they are not willing to declare war on the dwarf kingdom!"

Bishop Sauron reported with a gloomy face.

I thought it was a surefire thing, but I didn't expect to be rejected by others in the end. You must know that in order to win over the Kingdom of Ruthenia, they also paid a lot of money.

The great Holy See was able to pull down and form an alliance with a declining kingdom, but it was still rejected, it is simply...

In short, Bishop Sauron was ashamed by this incident, and now he is very angry, wishing to send troops to send the Ruthenian king to the barbecue immediately.

"Expanding the living space of the human race is everyone's responsibility and obligation. How could the Ruthenians refuse it just by saying no!

Send someone to warn the Ruthenian king, telling him: colluding with other races will not end well.

Other plans remain unchanged.

Ulisse, find an opportunity to plan several conflicts between the Dwarf Kingdom and the Ruthenian Kingdom. The bigger the matter, the better.

The dark son planted in Ruthenia, this time should also be activated. Release the news: Some high-level people in the Kingdom of Ruthenia have colluded with the dwarves and betrayed the interests of our human race. "

Pius VII ordered decisively.

Obviously, similar things have happened more than once. His rich experience in political struggles allowed him to skillfully make decisions.

…

Canglan City, after a simple renovation and renovation, the second arcane academy in mainland China with the mission of "pursuing the truth" has begun to enroll students.

The campus is contributed by the Liufeng family. It was originally their residence in the royal capital, but the persevering family has declined, and it is too eye-catching to continue to hold such a mansion.

According to normal circumstances, they are usually sold to emerging nobles. However, Duke Liufeng is not a simple person. Although he is a rookie in war, he still has political skills.

Overcome all opinions and blocked the proposal of family members to sell for cash. After mobilizing family connections, after a lot of hard work, I finally got the opportunity to donate to the Arcane Academy.

There is no doubt that this is a very good investment. The Arcane Academy jointly established by all the powerful forces in the kingdom was destined to be extraordinary from its birth.

Living every day in the house donated by the Liufeng family, if the academy doesn't take care of them, it will be hard to justify.

For the declining Liufeng family, the favor invested can save their lives at critical moments.

From the public preparations to the completion of the college to recruit students, it took less than two months, and it was a proper alpha speed.

Attended the inauguration ceremony of the academy in person, Caesar IV felt very complicated. I thought I could be the protagonist, but there are too many elders present.

Disregarding distant uncles for the time being, but uncles, uncles, great-grandfathers, great-grandfathers... a bunch of old royal family antiques have appeared.

The representatives sent by other great nobles in the Kingdom are also a group of old guys over a hundred years old. These guys all have common characteristics, not only powerful, but also surprisingly senior.

A group of old guys over a hundred years old were busy reminiscing about the old days, and directly left the king Caesar IV aside, making him a king who had no reputation at all.

Of course, this little depression is nothing. In the extraordinary world, the number of old and undead also means a deep foundation. In an era when the average life expectancy is thirty or forty, no one is weak if they can live to be more than one hundred years old.

It seems to be the foundation stone laying ceremony of the Arcane Academy, but it is actually a display of strength to the outside world. Tell the outside world that the Alpha Kingdom is not in decline.

"Your Majesty, the foundation stone laying ceremony went smoothly. This is not the style of the Holy See!"

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland said worriedly.

The last time the Frankish Kingdom's Arcane Academy opened, it was attacked many times. If the Franks hadn't suppressed it fast enough, the undead disaster would have almost erupted.

It is claimed to be the work of a cult, but whoever is sitting here does not know that it is the work of the Holy See!

It was so violent against the Frankish Kingdom, but it suddenly became milder when it came to the Alpha Kingdom, which is obviously unreasonable.

"Perhaps it was the failure last time that the Holy See learned a lesson and gave up this meaningless assassination.

But we still need to strengthen our vigilance. There are a bunch of lunatics in the Holy See, but they can do anything! "

Caesar IV said uncertainly.

All unreasonable behaviors can become understandable when they have something to do with a lunatic.

"Your Majesty, the quietness of the Holy See may have something to do with their next actions. There are indications that the Holy See is planning a war.

Who the specific target is is yet to be determined. However, several major armies of the Holy See have entered the stage of preparations.

Not only the Holy See, but the Kingdom of Dante in the middle, the Kingdom of the South Coast, the Kingdom of Frankish in the south, and the Kingdom of Iberia are all about to move.

A hundred years have passed since the last continental war ended. According to past practice, the next continental war is just around the corner! "

Earl Francis said anxiously.

(end of this chapter)
Chapter 377:
The King Chapter 377: development turn

"It's only a matter of time before a new round of continental war breaks out. In fact, the previous counterattack against the orcs has already revealed the true thoughts of several top forces.

After so many years of peace, countries have accumulated countless contradictions, and now it is time to vent.

If they didn't have a plan, they wouldn't have put in so much effort to help us defeat the orc empire.

My father predicted before his death that a new round of continental war would break out within ten years.

Compared with a hundred years ago, the overall strength of our human race has increased by at least 30%, while the strength of foreign races has not increased but decreased.

With the decline of the orc empire, the advantage of the alien alliance over our human race has been minimal.

In previous continental wars, the overall strength of the human race was obviously at a disadvantage, with more wins and fewer losses. Now that the strength of the two sides tends to be balanced, our chances of winning are even greater.

If the human race wins again in the new round of continental war, it can almost directly announce the end of the era of alien races. From now on, the continent of Aslante will be completely dominated by the human race.

There are three main waves of alien races in the northern continent, orcs, elves, and ancient survivors. After the best war orc empire was crippled, the threat of the remaining two has actually dropped significantly.

There are too many races of the ancient survivors. Although the combat power is strong, they all fight on their own, and they can't make a difference.

The strength of the elves is certainly strong, but it is a pity that their martial spirit was lost countless years ago.

It is obviously unreliable to expect those guys who are addicted to art to come out to fight.

As long as the northern countries do not take the initiative to invade the elf kingdom, even if the continental war breaks out, they may not be able to make up their minds to fight us desperately.

Based solely on the war against foreign races, we are actually not in much danger in this continental war.

I'm afraid that the foreign race will be disabled. Some people can't control their ambitions and want to continue to expand! "

Caesar IV said solemnly.

In previous continental wars, the main reason why the human race was able to win was the disunity of the alien races.

The two most powerful races among alien races, orcs and elves, are completely different extremes.

The warlike orcs have always been the vanguards in launching continental wars. However, the biggest disadvantage of being the first to participate in the battle is that the strength is consumed too quickly.

The Alpha Kingdom, which stood in front of them, was also full of resilience. No matter how bravely and fearlessly they waged war, they were still held back by this nail.

The elves, who are the champions of paddling, are another extreme. It's like being forcibly dragged onto the battlefield, most of the time it's a symbolic dispatch of troops to fight a few battles.

As long as you lose a few thousand clansmen, you will feel pain immediately, and you simply don't have the courage to attack at all costs. The greatest significance of the participation of the elves in the war is to hold back a large number of troops of the human race.

The alien races in the northern continent are all scammers, and the alien races in other parts of the mainland can only be tragic.

The strongest can't be counted on, and the weaker races have met the strongest forces of the human race. It is considered powerful to keep the ancestral foundation.

However, there is a limit to everything. After defeats again and again, the overall strength of these races is also constantly declining.

At this point, if they continue to fail, even if they are not exterminated, they will be eliminated from the stage of the continental hegemony.

Once the alien threat is gone, it will be time for the human race to fight among themselves. The final development of the situation, no one can tell.

"Your Majesty, there is no need to worry too much. The strength of the foreign race is not weak, especially at this critical moment of life and death, it can burst out its potential.

Once the continental war breaks out, it will definitely not end in a short time. Perhaps when the war is over, we will also recover.

Under the ups and downs, in the future game, the Kingdom may not be at a disadvantage! "

Prime Minister of Newfoundland comforted me.

The ease on his lips and the worry on his brow still revealed his inner uneasiness.

Even if there is no orc empire, it doesn't mean that the Alpha Kingdom can stay out of the continental war.

During the Civil War of the Warhammer Kingdom, the strength of the Principality of Moxi was greatly reduced, and no one in the Northern Continent could stop the elves except the Kingdom of Alpha.

When it comes to the competition for the living space of the races, no one can guarantee that the elves will still paddle in the next continental war.

As long as the elves put in a little effort, those small countries will not be able to hold back, and the Alpha Kingdom will still be dragged into the water.

Maybe the ancient survivors from the Ice and Snow World will come out to join in the fun, and the Alpha Kingdom will still be responsible for cleaning up the mess.

If the situation were a little worse, the orcs who were huddled in a corner might also come out of the mountains and compete with the seven grassland kingdoms for the orc prairie.

"Conduct our speculations and inform the great nobles everywhere so that they can prepare for war.

The kingdom's standing army must restore its strength as soon as possible. Especially the Warcraft Legion, more attention should be paid to it.

The Academy of Magic and the Academy of Arcane Arts, I would like to trouble the Prime Minister to go over there and ask them to increase the number of enrollments and focus on cultivating the combat effectiveness of the students.

If the talent is good, it may come in handy ten years later. "

Caesar IV said helplessly.

The cultivation of magicians, arcanists, wizards, alchemists... These professional talents not only require high talents, but also take a lot of time.

It is precisely because of the many restrictions that knights have become the mainstream of the mainland.

If the son of a great nobleman is talented, it is not a strange thing to become a great knight before the age of twenty.

But twenty-year-old great magicians are rare in the entire continent. Even if you have excellent talent and abundant resources, it still depends on luck.

Rare occupations such as Arcanist and Wizard, let alone. There are very few people who practice, and the probability of encountering a genius is even lower.

Even though the Arcane Academy opened, under the influence of inherent concepts, noble children still prefer to become magicians and knights.

…

In the Mountain Territory, Hudson is already busy arranging the autumn harvest. Compared with previous years, the biggest difference this autumn is that there is no need to buy food from the outside world.

The slaves were sent to the construction site, and there was no need for Hudson to continue exporting food. Tens of thousands of mouths were lost at once, and the food in the mountain territory became self-sufficient for the first time.

For territorial officials who have been plagued by fiscal deficits for a long time, this is the best medicine to heal their inner wounds.

The cost of purchasing food was saved, and the expenditure of purchasing salt was also greatly reduced. The dying steel industry resumed production, and the fiscal deficit of the territory was quickly wiped out.

According to the estimate of the Ministry of Finance, the fiscal deficit of the territory this year is expected to be controlled within 50,000 gold coins.

Compared with the shortfall of hundreds of thousands of gold coins in previous years, this is undoubtedly a huge improvement. As long as the stable development continues, there is hope to achieve a balance of payments next year.

Balance of income and expenditure is an important sign of the maturity of a territory, and it means that it has truly gained a firm foothold after passing this level.

Looking at the rough yellow paper in his hand, Hudson very much doubted whether it could be used for writing. However, as the first paper produced without sheepskin, it is understandable that it has some shortcomings.

"Let the following people continue to try to improve the process, and strive to produce qualified paper in the shortest possible time.

Kane, you should go grab this job. Tell the people below not to be afraid of failure, but to be brave enough to try. "

I don't know the specific papermaking process, and only rely on my smattering of memory, the development of the papermaking industry in the mountainous area is not smooth.

After the initial expectations, Hudson's expectations in his heart dropped again and again. When he was ready to fight the protracted war, the first piece of paper was finally born.

Regardless of whether the quality is good or bad, we have achieved a breakthrough from zero to one, and from one to one hundred in the later stage, we only need to continue to pile resources into it.

As a feudal lord, raw materials and labor do not cost money, and the cost that Hudson needs to pay is not high.

"Okay, Lord Earl!"

Kane readily agreed.

If the paper hadn't been made, he would have wondered if it was the lord's whimsy, but the first piece of paper had already been born, and the difficulty had already dropped by several grades in the later stage, only to improve the craftsmanship.

Deep in his heart, the awe of Hudson couldn't help but deepened again.

"My lord, the training of the first batch of fishermen has ended, and they are now engaged in fishing, and the results are even better than expected.

The fishery resources in this sea area are really rich. You can gain something by logging off the net almost at will.

The average daily fish production is 38,000 pounds.

The second batch of fishermen also participated in the training. Once the training is completed, the daily fish output of the territory will exceed 100,000 pounds.

It's just that the taste of these sea fish is very average, and they are not popular in the market. Unless there is a catastrophe, they will not be sold at all. "

Jacob said with mixed joy and sorrow.

The small market determines the limited sales of fish products. A large amount of fresh fish cannot be sold, so it can only be processed into dried fish.

Unfortunately, the market for dried fish is even smaller, and the aristocratic lords with purchasing power simply don't like this stuff, and the pitifully small number of free citizens are the buyers of dried fish.

The Dalton family failed to start this business, and encountered the same problem when they arrived in the mountainous area.

"Since you can't sell it, you can eat it yourself. The order will be passed down, and on the basis of the rations of the people, three pounds of dried fish will be added every month.

Store the remaining dried fish first! As long as it is well marinated, it won't go bad for a while, and maybe it will come in handy in the future. "

Hudson said calmly.

Long wanted to increase the meat supply of the citizens, but due to the low production of pork, beef and mutton, after prioritizing the needs of artisans, ordinary citizens could only get a one-pound quota per month.

Now that there is fish supplementation, Hudson has also become generous. As for the taste, in the era when being able to fill one's stomach is happiness, there is no need to think so much for the time being.

In fact, Hudson has also worked hard for the nutrition of the citizens.

In addition to the supply of meat, the supply of vegetables is also specified. Many wild vegetables that taste good are widely planted in mountainous areas.

The vegetable oil originally intended to produce soap ended up in everyone's stomachs. Now ordinary citizens can get a half-pound vegetable oil quota every month.

Of course, there is another practical factor behind this-soap is unsalable.

It's the wizarding world after all, and there are better alternatives to soap. The nobles thought it was for the untouchables, and directly labeled the soap as a low-end product.

For the sake of face, the little nobles are also embarrassed to buy. Soap, which was a little hot just now, has become a product of the poor before it can be popularized.

Constrained by the original traditional production process and the high price of raw materials, the production cost of soap remains high. If the price is reduced and the volume is reduced, it will be a blood loss, so we have to choose to stop production.

The product was not produced, and Hudson did not let go of the planting of oil crops. The squeezed oil naturally entered the stomachs of the people.

If it weren't for the improvement in nutrition supply, the long-term land reclamation work would have worn out people, and it simply couldn't last until now.

Of course, in addition to these regular rations, there will be opportunities to improve food during special festivals and major events.

Compared to many territories in the Aslante continent, the living standards of the people in the mountainous territories are definitely at the top.

The biggest beneficiary is still the younger generation. Obtained a quota of oil and meat equivalent to that of an adult, without heavy physical labor, and his physical fitness has improved significantly.

The most direct manifestation is: the proportion of people suitable for joining the army is constantly rising.

As for the youngsters who have the talent for cultivation and have been selected into the territorial reserves since they were young, and trained individually, that's not to mention.

Cultivation resources may not be guaranteed, but there is absolutely no shortage of meat supply.

"Master Earl, adding three pounds of dried fish at one time, will it be too much?

It is better to increase the supply of dried fish by one pound first, and the rest will be distributed in the form of rewards according to the specific performance of the leaders.

Or when organizing collective labor, directly add it to the food standard in order to better mobilize everyone's enthusiasm for labor. "

Jacob said in pain.

In order to stimulate productivity, although household contracting is not implemented, in specific agricultural production, tasks are still divided.

First, the tasks were assigned with Baojia as the unit, and then gradually implemented to the family. There is a clear division of who is in charge of which field.

When it comes to the autumn harvest season, those with high output will receive material rewards, which can be meat products and oil, clothes and shoes, or daily necessities; those with low output can only get the basic material quota.

In this context, the living standards of ordinary people in the mountainous areas have gradually become divided.

The life of the down-to-earth citizens is getting better and better; for those who steal, **** and play tricks, life is still so hard.

In a sense, this can be regarded as an alternative distribution of production to households within the scope of the rules.

Anyway, the serf system and land property rights, Lord Hudson dare not touch it now. If these core issues are not involved, it is just the optimization of the management system, not the reform of the social system.

The optimization of the management system, even if it is exposed, is nothing more than everyone learning together. If changes are made to the social system, it will stab a hornet's nest.

In fact, the political fallout is far more serious than that. There are not many crimes that can cause a nobleman to be deprived of a title, but this is one of them.

"Well, let's do as you say! The Ministry of Government Affairs has formulated a specific standard and made it clear in the reward and punishment mechanism.

The focus of the next step is to divert the citizens. Judging from the current situation, the food production capacity of the territory can already be self-sufficient, and the follow-up land reclamation efforts can be slightly slowed down.

Next year's land reclamation goal, let's cut it by one-fifth! The vacated labor force is invested in other fields.

Residents who are over 30 years old do not need to change their occupations. But the career arrangement of the younger generation must be carried out according to the actual needs of the territory, and not all of them can be sent to farm.

The Ministry of Government Affairs must start work in this area early. We can't wait until the territory has excess food production capacity before considering this issue. "

Everything is relative, along with food self-sufficiency. The strategic planning of the mountain territory must also be adjusted.

The land reclamation work still needs to continue, but the investment must be reduced. After all, other industries must also develop, and we cannot focus all our attention on farming.

Although more food is better, it also has a limit. In the absence of a market, blindly increasing grain production capacity will only drive down the price of grain to the point where cabbage can't even be sold.

In the final analysis, it is still a population problem. If there are millions of people in the mountain territory, then all this will not be a problem.

Unfortunately, there are only more than 300,000 people in the mountainous territory. Even if Hudson has introduced many policies to stimulate fertility, it still cannot quench the near thirst.

"Lord Earl, if we only reduce the wasteland reclamation goal by one-fifth, I am afraid that our food production capacity will soon be severely oversupplied.

In fact, starting next year we will have a food surplus. And the amount of this balance will be very considerable.

It is better to stop the land reclamation work first to reduce the burden on the territory. We have worked so hard for so many years, so we just took this opportunity to take a rest. "

Jacob spoke persuasively.

Obviously, the Ministry of Government Affairs is not going to continue to open up wasteland. People's consumption of food is completely different during working hours and resting hours.

Once land reclamation stops, the ration consumption of the citizens can be reduced by at least one-third.

This part of the grain alone is enough to feed more than one hundred thousand people for a year. Coupled with the continuous increase in the grain output of the newly opened land, the final balance will only be more, so it is not surprising that the Ministry of Government Affairs stopped the land reclamation work.

"It doesn't matter, just build more granaries if there is excess production capacity. Once people are idle, they are prone to problems. The intensity of land reclamation can be reduced, but it must be gradually reduced.

Follow-up, you can gradually reduce everyone's labor level and increase the rest time of the leaders, but you can't just relax.

If there are not enough job placements, then organize people for military training. The world is not peaceful, and it is only a matter of time before a war breaks out.

Starting from next year, the reserve training that was originally stopped will resume again. Except for special positions, all young people of the right age in the territory must participate in military training.

In addition, I lowered the selection threshold for the youth camp. As long as the cultivation qualifications are adequate and the parents have no criminal records, I will recruit people.

As far as Hudson knows, there is an unlucky dragon among the four dragon knights in the mainland, and he has been sleeping for more than ten years now.

The giant dragon is not very good-tempered. If it disturbs their sleep, they will beat up even the dragon knight.

Unless it is a matter of life and death, generally no one will forcibly wake up the sleeping dragon.

Vaguely, Hudson discovered that the dragon's deep sleep seemed to be related to the increase in strength. It seems to be sleeping, but it is actually digesting the growing strength in the body.

Following him for the past few years, Maxim's strength has grown much faster. In just a few years, it has gone the way of hundreds of years under normal circumstances.

The rapid increase in strength naturally takes time to digest. If he didn't sleep for decades, that would be considered a face for him.

Of course, it is also possible that Maxim was worried that the days of this kind of rapid growth would be limited, so he forcibly controlled his dormant thoughts.

After all, compared with dragons, the lifespan of humans is too short. In case Hudson is gone when he wakes up, it will be difficult to grow his strength quickly.

The dragon will also weigh whether it is good for a while or good for a lifetime.

Lighted a bonfire, strung a processed hare, and Hudson prepared lunch.

As for his own dragon and bear, in this case, he naturally tried to help solve it. He didn't have the time to cook for two big eaters.

"My lord, the capital sent an urgent message. Last night, the Human Race Alliance Council made a resolution to declare war on the Alien Race Alliance. At this moment, the mainland war has broken out!"

Hearing what the soldiers said, Hudson's face changed drastically, and even the hare in his hand fell into the bonfire.

The international situation is tense, and he has also heard about it. However, the continent of Yaslant was always at war, and there were far more tense days than peaceful days.

According to the usual practice, local conflicts usually break out first, and then regional wars are triggered, and then the wars escalate step by step, gradually evolving into continental wars.

According to Hudson's analysis, the continental war will break out in five years. It never occurred to him that the rehearsal had just begun, and it would directly enter the climax stage.

It is a pity that the rise of the Koslow family is too short, and has not yet been recognized by the mainland aristocratic circle. The application of the members of the Human Race Alliance was rejected.

If you want to understand what happened behind this, you can only wait through the kingdom. The news has passed through one hand, not to mention the accuracy problem, the light efficiency has been delayed a lot.

The terrible news of declaring war on the alien alliance, under normal circumstances, should be sent back with the magic communication circle as soon as the decision is made.

If nothing else, a group of veteran nobles received the news last night, and Hudson was half a day later than them.

It seems that this little time is nothing, but if it comes to a critical moment, half a day's work can determine the life and death of a party.

Being ruthless, Hudson decided to build a magic circle of communication when he went back, and he couldn't continue to transfer people.

If something important happens and the Dalton family deliberately delays it, he will receive the news even later.

As for the position of the member of the Terran Alliance, it still needs a long-term effort. It is not enough to just get the support of the nobles in the kingdom, it is also necessary to get the support of nobles from all over the mainland.

"Send an order to Tom to step up his guard and ensure the safety of the team. If you encounter trouble on the road, you can first ask the nobles along the way for help."

After finishing speaking, Hudson extinguished the fire with a water polo technique. Regardless of the delay, he immediately aroused Maxim, soared into the dragon, and galloped towards the territory.

The continental war broke out, affecting all aspects. Not only the Alpha Kingdom needs to make strategic adjustments, but a series of policies of the Mountain Territory must also be changed accordingly.

In comparison, escorting the Warcraft captives back can only be regarded as a small problem.

With the **** of two regiments, accidents are basically impossible in the southeastern province. Even if you run into trouble, there are nobles along the way who can help.

The name of Hudson is still very useful in the middle and lower aristocratic circles. As long as it does not harm their own interests, everyone will not mind selling favors.

Even if everyone is not communicating now, no one can guarantee that there will be no communication in the future. Not to mention anything else, once a war breaks out, the position of commander in chief of the kingdom will most likely belong to Hudson.

At that time, it will be completely different if there is friendship and no friendship. With a little care, the probability of surviving the battlefield and making meritorious deeds will greatly increase.
Chapter 386:
The King Chapter 386: The wonderful Hastelloy strategy

Elf forest, with the news of the outbreak of the continental war, the three great elf kings gathered together again.

In the eyes of the outside world, the elves who split into three kingdoms have long been in conflict. They regard each other as heretics and wish to put each other to death.

If it weren't for the pressure of the human race, they would have broken out a civil war long ago. After all, who can tolerate heresy?

The forest elves, prairie elves, and night elves have three major races, but because of their different ideas, they established their own countries independently.

However, the atmosphere in the hall is completely different from what everyone imagined.

The three great elf kings who haven't seen each other for a long time, like good sisters, go on with the daily routine together. There is no grievance that they have to join forces due to the situation.

"Sister, the situation is not good! The ambition of the human race is greater than we expected, and the frequency of launching continental wars is getting higher and higher.

Counting the history of continental wars in the last 10,000 years, apart from those stupid and dirty orcs, the human race provoked the most.

The most domineering thing is the introduction of the "Five Times Advantage Act", which simply beats whoever is stronger, without any reason at all.

Back then, in order to avoid the oppression of the human race, we had to accept the advice of the sages and split because of disagreement.

But you can hide for a while, but you can't hide forever. According to the expansion speed of the human race's strength, I am afraid that it will not be long before they will still be eyeing us. "

The night elf queen said worriedly.

The elves have been inherited from ancient times, and they have experienced countless winds and rains all the way to the present, but they have never been so urgent as they are now.

Even when the most domineering orcs ruled the mainland, the elves could say no to them.

Transition to the era of the human race, the situation has changed. The human race is not that overbearing, but the human race can play politics!

The orc empire at its peak seemed powerful, but the elves had to face only one of the royal families, and there was no need to be cowardly.

The human race is not that aggressive. They haven't sent troops to invade the elves in the past few hundred years, but the threat to them is even greater.

Watching the various races in the mainland continue to decline under the suppression of the human race, it is impossible not to panic.

"Don't worry, third sister. Back then, the sages had predicted that when the human race completely overwhelmed all the races in the mainland, it was also the beginning of their civil war.

My elves are in a safe place, and the geographical location is the best cover. As long as a superpower is not allowed to appear among the human race in the Northern Continent, it will not be able to threaten us.

The human race is the most selfish, and the human race kingdoms in the south and central regions will not spend their expeditions for no reason. What good is it to the northern countries to help them attack us?

Besides, we are not easy to bully. We have been showing weakness to the enemy all these years, but it does not mean that we are really weak!

If we really put our lives together, we can definitely bring several big human nations to the end. Are they willing to die with us? "

The forest elf queen said murderously.

The fact that the elves have been passed down from ancient times to the present is not based on "peace-loving", but on terrifying strength.

With excellent cultivation talent and a long enough lifespan, what the elves need most is a master.

Rare magisters and great magisters are rarely seen in the outside world. Even if they are not everywhere in the elves, they are really not lacking.

Almost every elf village has a magister.

It doesn't take much effort, as long as you live long enough, you can become a master by grinding kung fu with water.

The only regret is that the fertility is too low. The current strength is based on long-term accumulation. Once the vitality is exhausted in the war, it may not be able to recover for hundreds of years.

For the elves, many times even if they win on the battlefield, they fail strategically.

The outside world only saw the elves paddling in the previous continental wars, and mistakenly thought that they had lost their fighting spirit. Little did they know that this was a race with low fertility and had to make a choice.

For the elves, participating in the continental war is very simple. It is not difficult to sweep the entire northern continent, but the difficulty is after the battle is over!

Theoretically speaking, if the elves can join forces with all the races on the mainland at any cost, they have every chance of pulling the human race down from their position of supremacy.

But after pulling down the human race, they can only watch other races grow bigger, but they can't get any benefits for themselves.

There are only a few million people in total, and it doesn't make any sense to give them more land.

One hundred and eighty years later, other races have made further progress in recovery, leaving them still licking their wounds.

Before they could recover, the new mainland overlord came again. Continue to join hands with all ethnic groups in the mainland, and then bring down the overlord of the mainland?

Even if they can win every war, they will become weaker and weaker. After tossing and tossing for a short time, he tossed and wiped out his family fortune.

If you can't afford to fight a war of attrition, you can only rely on force to deter. Judging from the current situation, the strategy of the elves is still successful.

There are many human countries that have had conflicts with the elves, and those who dared to send troops to invade the elves have disappeared in the past few hundred years.

The last one did this, the bones turned into mud, and stayed in the elf forest to nourish all things.

The current elves are like a rich second generation who has limited ability and inherited a lot of wealth. As long as you don't go out and toss, you can live comfortably.

"The elder sister means that we should follow the original plan and send troops symbolically, just to hold back part of the human race's troops?

But this is too cowardly. If the human race wins again, the Alien Alliance may be overwhelmed.

I think it's better to take this opportunity to wipe out those human nations that condone slave traders, expand the elf forest to hundreds of kilometers, and increase our strategic buffer! "

The Queen of the Grassland Elf suggested.

The biggest harm the human race can do to the elves is slave hunting. Almost every year, there are disobedient elves who are brutally murdered by slave traders because they are curious about the outside world.

Because of this problem, the elves have often had disputes with human countries.

As for the several human nations next to the elves, it was purely because of their bad luck. Indulging the slave hunting team is purely a crime of wanting to impose.

Living under the eyes of the elves, the local nobles dare not even raise elf slaves, let alone capture slaves themselves.

They can't afford to provoke the elves, and they can't afford to provoke the slave catchers from all over the mainland.

In name, these notorious slave traders are a group of low-level mercenaries, but in fact, there are no weak people who can freely enter and exit the Elven Forest.

Under the system of the Aslante Continent, apart from the vests of the major forces, how can there be so many masters among the people?

The elves asked them to fight the slave trade; the human world also had a need for elf slaves, and they were required to provide convenience for slave trade.

As a small human country caught in the middle, it is purely a dilemma.

The only thing they can do is to guarantee to the elves that they will fight the slave trade;

Actions against the slave trade have never stopped. It's just that the ones who are attacked are all wild slave traders, and those with background and background are not touched.

Relying on both sides, they managed to survive, but they also disgusted the elves.

Didn't touch the bottom line. In order to take the overall situation into consideration, the elves didn't do anything to them.

But that was a period of peace, and now that it has entered a period of continental war, the situation has become different.

The Human Race Alliance and the Alien Race Alliance have already started a war. As one of the Alien Race Alliance, the Elf Race has nothing wrong with attacking them at this time.

"Wait a minute, the continental war has just begun, and the human race still has some power in the northern continent, so we don't need to be the first bird.

Estimating those warlike orcs, they can't sit still anymore. The human race has just occupied the orc prairie, and the local foundation is not stable. The seven prairie kingdoms should not be able to stop the orc army.

When they destroy the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland, and the army reaches the gate of King Alpha, we will make an example of others, and the price we need to pay will be much smaller.

Arranging people to send a batch of magic equipment to all ethnic groups in the mainland is our support for them. By the way, I'm picking some destructive secrets and sending them over, I guess our allies can use them.

The orcs will take the initiative to attack, so send more magic-breaking scrolls. In case they were blocked by the human city again, they were delayed on the road. "

The forest elf queen said with a smile.

To hang out on the continent of Aslante, you need not only strength, but also brains.

The power of allies can be borrowed, and it is not in vain. What's more, in the name of supporting allies, you can sell a wave of favors.

The elves who paddled water in all previous continental wars have not been expelled from the alien alliance. The most important thing is that they have made substantial contributions to the war.

Not participating in the war, it means that the tribe loves peace and has no desire to fight. When it comes to supporting their allies, they never hesitate.

The aid of various magic equipment and potions has never stopped. In order to support the various races on the mainland, the elves even set up teleportation magic circles leading to the various races.

If it weren't for the huge cost of this magic circle, too many restrictions, and the limited transmission ability, the alien alliance would not have been in a passive state all the time.

…

The orc empire, the five great beast emperors who escaped in the last war, gathered together again.

A friend in need is a friend.

Looking at being beaten together, everyone still helped the Beamons in times of crisis, and did not let the five royal families become the four royal families.

After losing the fertile prairie, the power of the orc empire was severely weakened. Even though all the vassal races were weakened during the war, the position of the five royal families is still unstable at this moment.

Crisis is not only sourced from the outside, but also from the inside. The defeat exposed many hidden problems within the imperial court, and pointed the finger at the five emperors.

If it was in the past, thunderous means could be used to suppress it. But this time it's different, if we continue to kill each other, no one will be available.

It is not a matter of losing soldiers or generals, but that the population of all ethnic groups has dropped sharply, and the potential for war has been greatly weakened.

Just relying on the barren land now is simply not enough to support their recovery. After more than two years of recuperation, some viable vassal races have already experienced a contradiction between population growth and insufficient resources.

"Those idiots thought that if they didn't send troops, the human race would let them go. They didn't expect that only two years later, the continental war broke out.

If they act earlier and join forces with us, they will definitely be able to pull the human race from the position of the overlord of the mainland!

Now that the situation is breaking down, you think of us, why did you go early? "

Xiong Renhuang said viciously.

It can be seen that he was very dissatisfied with the performance of the alien alliance in the last war.

They keep saying that they want to support them, but when it comes to specific actions, they all use various excuses to shirk.

Apart from calling for a few mediations, it did not provide much substantive help to the Orc Empire.

"The Emperor Xiong calm down, now is not the time to be angry. No matter how much the Alien Alliance has done before, we can't just sit back and watch them lose.

Without them holding back the main force of the human race, relying on our own strength alone, we will never be able to take back the orc prairie.

Judging from the current situation, this war may already be the alliance's last chance. If they lose to the race again, their dominance of the mainland will really be unshakable!

In fact, we now have no choice. To stay in this corner is to wait for death.

Once the Seven Kingdoms of the Prairie have gained a firm foothold, it will be difficult to drive them out. "

Alex persuasively said.

As the target of being targeted by the human race, the life of the Beamon clan is really miserable now.

Even if the four clans give them a hand, it will not change the nature of the orc empire. As the weakest royal family, they were naturally assigned to the most barren territory.

Because of the small number of people in the tribe, they can barely support themselves, but it is somewhat difficult to support the vassal races.

After a while, the contradiction can be forcibly suppressed. But with the passage of time, the conflict of insufficient resources will break out sooner or later.

If you don't want to get caught in internal fighting, you can only fight out. As long as the orc prairie is taken back, there will be no such troubles for at least ten years.

"Emperor Bimon is right, we really can't just sit and wait for death. If we let the race grow bigger, sooner or later we will usher in the disaster of genocide.

I understand it, they just want to dominate the continent, and they are not prepared to leave room for all kinds of living.

At this moment when there is no way to retreat, I don't believe that the elves can still watch the fun from the sidelines. With their participation, at least the human race can be driven out of the North Continent.

The opportunity for revenge has come, so don't miss it. Taking advantage of the unstable foundation of the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland, let's destroy them first.

Whether the follow-up is to accept as soon as it is good, or go all the way south to destroy the Alpha Kingdom, can be decided according to the development of the situation! "

The Lion Emperor said murderously.

It can be seen that he really lacks confidence. He still has confidence in winning the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland, but he only has one thought about destroying the Alpha Kingdom.

There is no way, the current strength of the Orc Empire is insufficient, and they are not strong enough to speak.

If he showed his chariot and horses and pulled them out for a field battle, he still had the confidence to defeat the Alpha Kingdom, but that was only a defeat.

To smash the tortoise shell of that road and destroy the Alpha Kingdom in one fell swoop, the Lion Emperor dare not even think about it now.

The main force was severely damaged, and the cannon fodder troops were also not enough. No matter how the cannon fodder race can be born, it will take time.

"Since you both want to fight, then I will accompany you to the end. Take back the prairie first, and then go to the Alpha people to settle the score!"

The Silver Moon Wolf Emperor gritted his teeth and said.

The prairie is the most suitable place for wolves to live. When they arrived in this poor country, they were about to eat grass instead.

…

While all ethnic groups in the mainland were preparing for war, the mountain leaders also started a meeting to decide the future destiny of the territory.

The high-level leaders of the territory who were able to rush back and the core members of the Koslow family all gathered together at this moment to discuss the continental war.

The younger generation is eager to try, wanting to gain greater military exploits in the ensuing chaos; the older ones are completely different, all of them are frowning and worried.

Glancing at everyone's expressions, Hudson said directly: "The main reason for calling everyone to this meeting today is to tell you that the years of peace are coming to an end, and we must prepare for war.

The continental war is inevitable. When it will affect the Alpha Kingdom and when it will affect my mountain territory, everything is unknown.

There is no need for you to worry about the kingdom. If you can avoid participating in the war, you will definitely find a way to avoid it; if you can participate in this war late, you will definitely not participate in it early.

Now what we have to do is: while preparing for the battle, we must also seize the time to develop the territory.

First of all the reserve training will be resumed from now on. The original plan to gradually reduce land reclamation and shift to the development of a light industrial economy has now been cancelled.

With food in hand, don't panic.

What we need to do now is to open up more wasteland and store more grain. Set a goal first, increase the grain reserves of the territory to 500,000 tons within one year, and increase the grain reserves to 800,000 tons within two years.

The Ministry of Government Affairs first organized manpower and repaired the warehouse for me. I would rather wait for the food in an empty warehouse than have no place to store the food when it arrives.

Just relying on the production of the territory will definitely not be able to complete the goal. But it doesn't matter, the southeast province is a big province of grain production, we can still go out to buy.

The flames of war won't burn out for a while, this is the best opportunity. The Ministry of Commerce will implement it for me when it goes down. Before the news spreads and the price of grain has not risen, it has opened up the purchase for me.

In addition to agricultural development, the speed of fishery development must also be accelerated. Notify the shipyard and let them prioritize the production of fishing boats.

In addition to daily needs, the fishery department must contribute 8,000 tons of dried fish to me this year, and this number will be doubled next year, as the military food reserve for the territory.

When it comes to the battlefield, these dried fish are the best food. The Ministry of Government Affairs will step up implementation.

If there are monsters in the sea, please send someone to notify them immediately, and I will ask Maxim to help you solve the trouble.

In addition to these tasks, there is another priority, which is to hurry up and have a baby.

Especially the younger generation in the family, as long as they are of age, they will be arranged first.

The situation on the battlefield is changing, and no one knows what will happen in the future. It's better to leave a bloodline inheritance in advance than to end up..."

The sudden change of words made a group of young family members very confused. The previous content was very normal, why did it suddenly become a large-scale marriage urging and birthing scene?

The reasons given by Hudson are too good to allow them to refuse.

Even if you have an idea in your heart, you want to wait for success and fame to pursue a good marriage, but now you can only dispel this idea.

Arrogance, it also depends on the target. When they met Hudson, who was in his twenties and had already made a name for himself, they really couldn't hold back.

Looking at the depressed younger generation of the family, Hudson smiled slightly. To be honest, that's right.

Regardless of how the external situation develops, there is nothing wrong with having more children. He is still very relieved about the reproductive talent of the Koslow family.

Compared with other families, this is the biggest advantage. As long as we seize the time to have more children now, our own population advantage will become more and more obvious after the war.

What's more, in any world, everyone pays attention to the effect of superiors and inferiors. As long as the nobles above are willing to take the lead in giving birth, the serfs below will definitely be willing to follow.

Anyway, the cost of raising children is borne by the lord, and they don't need to worry about it.
