Chapter 387:
The King Chapter 387: born of sorrow

Before the territorial affairs were arranged, Hudson received an invitation from Governor Pierce, and then received an invitation from the king.

When the Continental War broke out, mountainous territories needed to take countermeasures, and provinces and kingdoms were no exception.

The Kingdom, in particular, has been hit the hardest. As the most powerful country in the Northern Continent, the Alpha Kingdom has not only glory, but also responsibilities.

Once foreign races invade on a large scale, the kingdom will inevitably send troops to rescue all countries. Of course, the specific rescue efforts depend on moral integrity.

…

"Hudson, are we going to war again?"

Melissa asked concerned.

I don't know why, but since giving birth to her eldest son, her political sense has become dull.

Reached out and patted the ashes on little Franz, Hudson nodded slightly.

"The continental war has broken out, and there will be no more pure land in the entire Aslant continent, and no one can be alone.

But this time the human race has a huge advantage, and the probability of winning is as high as 90%, so there is no need to worry too much.

Maybe after this war, aliens will no longer be a threat. Use a war to stabilize the dominance of our human race, no matter how much you pay, it's worth it! "

The principle is correct, but when the price needs to be borne by oneself, it is another picture.

They are all fighting for the survival of the race. Standing on their respective positions, everyone is on the side of justice.

"Then be careful, don't try to be brave on the battlefield, Franz is still waiting for you to come back!"

While speaking, tears appeared in the corners of Melissa's eyes.

The more you know, the more you know the awe.

In the eyes of ordinary people, a dragon knight like Hudson is free to do anything on the battlefield. He is the only one who kills people, and no one can do anything to him.

Melissa, who is familiar with history books, knows very well how **** the battles of various clans were during the Continental War, and there were not a few dragon knights who fell on the battlefield.

Heroes emerge in troubled times, but more people have become the stepping stones of heroes. Once the success is complete, the vast majority of people are on the way to becoming heroes.

Reaching out to help Melissa wipe away her tears, Hudson said with a smile: "You can rest assured. The war will last for a while, and the kingdom will not be burned.

Even if they join the war now, they will only send troops symbolically. Unless the situation on the front line deteriorates, it won't be my turn to play. "

There is nothing wrong with it. As a banner of the Alpha Kingdom's military, Hudson will not go to the front line unless it is absolutely necessary.

After all, other people lead troops out to reinforce, and if they lose, they lose. The impact on the kingdom is not very great.

If Hudson is defeated, even if it is only a small defeat, it will cause an uproar and affect the morale of the kingdom's army.

…

Emerald Palace.

Glanced at the important ministers from all over the kingdom, Caesar IV said a little tiredly:

"The continental war has already broken out. We don't need to worry about the situation in the southern and central continents. The war was initiated by them, so we should have made comprehensive preparations.

The trouble is the North Continent!

The alien race is the most powerful in the northern continent. None of the elves, orcs, and ancient survivors are easy to mess with.

The strength of our human race is the weakest here. Every time the continental war broke out, the kingdom has undertaken the main task of fighting against alien races.

The current situation is slightly better. There are seven steppe kingdoms separating us from the orc empire, adding a strategic barrier.

But what the specific situation is, everyone knows it in their hearts. The strength of the Seven Kingdoms in the Grassland alone can't stop the orc army.

The situation in the other two lines is not optimistic. The elves and the ancient survivors also provoked the flames of war.

As of now, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has received requests for help from eleven countries. Judging from the content, everything is urgent. "

While speaking, the attendants had already distributed the appeal letter to everyone.

After a long while, the faces of the nobles who had a general understanding of the situation all collapsed.

Theoretically speaking, the Alpha Kingdom is obliged to send troops to rescue allies. However, so many distress letters arrived almost at the same time, there was no way they could be rescued!

"Your Majesty, from a military point of view, the kingdom does not have the ability to rescue all countries at the same time.

I think it's better to transfer these appeal letters to the Parliament of the Ethnic Alliance and seek help from all countries in the mainland.

Of course, as a responsible nation, we cannot do nothing.

The Kingdom of Warhammer is in endless civil war, and now the situation is critical, and it is just time to persuade them to cease fighting.

Whether they are re-merging or becoming independent into two countries, as long as they stop their internal fighting, it will have very important positive significance for the North Continent battlefield. "

Hudson suggested by himself.

Except for the first sentence, which is the truth, the rest are all excuses, without any nutritional value.

There is no way, everyone's eyes are focused on him, forcing him to open his eyes and talk nonsense.

Use soldiers like gods, just use them to fool others. If you follow suit, you will be done for!

In fact, Hudson is also making a big gamble. With the safety of the Northern Continent as a bargaining chip, the elves will not invade with all their might.

As long as this paddling champion is still just paddling, the Alpha Kingdom will be able to survive this catastrophe.

As for mediating the Warhammer Kingdom's civil war, that's pure nonsense. Except for a few battles at the very beginning, most of the time people were just "quarreling and fighting".

Everyone is a smart person. Knowing that the situation in the mainland is tense, but still fighting desperately, isn't it boring.

The struggle between nobles is essentially the art of struggle and compromise. If there were no external interference, the Warhammer Kingdom would have been unified long ago.

Noisy, that is because someone gave them the confidence to make them think that they have the ability to overwhelm each other.

At this moment, the mainland war broke out, and the ancient survivors formed a group to invade the Warhammer Kingdom. They couldn't stop if they didn't want to.

After all, this is a race war of life and death.

It's life or death, there is no third choice.

"There is no problem in mediating the civil war in the Warhammer Kingdom.

Since the outbreak of the Continental War, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has been in contact with the two major factions within the Warhammer Kingdom, and both sides have a lot of sincerity.

However, judging from the current situation, even if the Warhammer Kingdom stopped the civil war, it would be difficult to stop the soldiers of the ancient survivors, let alone support neighboring countries to resist the invasion of the elves. "

Earl Francis said worriedly.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs was definitely the most active department in the Alpha Kingdom after the outbreak of the Continental War.

Coordinate the two major factions of the Warhammer Kingdom to join forces to fight against the enemy. Naturally, they will be present in this kind of prestige building.

The understanding of the situation is also the deepest. It is very clear that the current Warhammer Kingdom is no longer useful.

"Then find a way to stabilize the elves first!

Different from other races in the mainland, the elves have a slow reproductive ability and do not have the strength to compete for hegemony on the mainland. They are not a big threat to our human race.

In recent years, the conflict between the human race and the elves is nothing more than someone capturing elf slaves.

Big deal, we made a promise to ban elf slave trade in the kingdom, and made a proposal in the Human Race Alliance Parliament to make capturing and trading elves a felony.

Based on the current situation, the probability of the Alliance Council agreeing is very high. As a matter of sincerity, the kingdom first released the elf slaves in its hands.

Of course, this is limited to slaves who have just been captured and have not been insulted.

Those elven slaves who have been insulted must be dealt with immediately, and no hidden dangers can be left at this time. "

Hudson said seriously.

In his opinion, exchanging the ban on slave hunting for the neutrality of the elves is too cost-effective.

Even if it doesn't work, as long as it can delay the speed of the elves' dispatch of troops, it will also have very important strategic significance.

"Earl Hudson, you think things too simply. Those who have elf slaves are all great nobles from all over the world.

Even if the Human Race Alliance Congress passed laws, it would be difficult to restrain them. Our proposal at a time like this has no substantive meaning other than offending people! "

Duke Torsten taunted.

This is a fact. The Human Race Alliance Parliament's binding force on all countries is strong, and it is pitifully weak.

Whether it can play a role depends on whether it is in everyone's interest. Only when the interests of the group are safeguarded, the laws of the alliance are truly binding.

"Duke Torsten, it doesn't matter whether it is binding or not, at least our decision can be implemented within the kingdom and can play a role in the northern continent.

You can't put the kingdom's safety at risk just because you don't want to part with a few elf slaves.

Regardless of these promises, whether the elves can be neutralized, at least the Ministry of Foreign Affairs can use this excuse to first pull the elves to the negotiating table.

An extra day of talking gives us an extra day of preparation. It would be even better if it could be delayed for a few years until the situation in the mainland becomes clear. "

Hudson said calmly.

In fact, he still has a lot to say. This continental war is different from the past, and the participation enthusiasm of the elves must be different.

If you want to stabilize the elves, the price you need to pay will definitely be greater.

Similar things have precedents in history. The outside world only saw the elves as paddling champions, but didn't notice that they all got benefits in the previous continental wars.

In order to keep the elves neutral, not only the Alpha Kingdom has promised him benefits, but all countries in the mainland have made similar promises.

Secretly, the elves have even signed secret agreements with many human countries.

This is not waste paper. With the blessing of magic power, many secret agreements are mandatory for the signers.

Looking at the performance of the countries of the human race, we know that every time a major international conflict occurs, the measures taken by the elves are mediation.

Compared to the Orc Empire, which is also in the Northern Continent, where dungeons are often organized by groups, the elves are really much happier.

However, these contracts are not without hidden dangers. Once the person in power changes, the original secret agreement will lose its binding force.

After all, no matter how binding a contract is, it can only restrain the signer of the contract, and it is impossible to expand the scope without limit.

"Earl Hudson is right, as long as the pace of elves sending troops is delayed, any opportunity should be tried.

Isn't it just a few elf slaves? Compared with the interests of the human race, I believe that most nobles with conscience will make the right choice.

Everyone present, please express your opinion first, can you give up the elf slave in your hand? "

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland asked sharply.

The old prime minister, who had been silent for many years, once again showed his decisive side, as if bringing everyone back to the era of Caesar III.

It is impossible to refuse, and all the words have been said, if anyone continues to object, it is an unscrupulous nobleman who has no regard for the overall situation.

Wearing such a hat, you don't have to mix in the noble circle.

No matter how upset they were, everyone could only force their smiles, pretending to be happy and agreeing.

After the big strategy was decided, Hudson instantly became a little transparent, and the audience was silent on how to support countries.

It is enough to do the limelight once, and there is no need to finish it alone.

These nobles present are all the elites of the Alpha Kingdom, and all of them have experienced wars.

Even if you don't have the talent to lead soldiers, at least you know how to lead soldiers. When supporting allies, one is more stable than the other, without the slightest aggressiveness.

In the end, everyone unanimously decided to send a legion of reinforcements to each of the eleven countries. As for when to send troops and how to form the troops, it is natural to discuss slowly.

Anyway, the Alpha Kingdom promised to send troops, and it must fulfill its ally obligations with practical actions. As for the efficiency of implementation, it only needs to catch up with the average speed of the mainland countries.

After all, this is an expedition to 11 countries, and it must be fully prepared.

…

At almost the same time, the Principality of Moxi was also holding a similar military meeting. The only difference was that George had seven fewer letters of appeal for help.

Maybe it was due to distance considerations, or maybe it was because the Principality of Moxi would also be caught in the flames of war in the near future. In short, the Seven Prairie Kingdoms did not ask them for help.

The absence of seven letters of appeal for help does not mean that the Principality of Moxi will be relaxed. Because of geopolitics, the pressure they need to bear is even greater than that of the Alpha Kingdom.

Once the Warhammer Kingdom collapses, the flames of war will immediately spread to the Moxi Principality.

Whether it is the coalition army of the ancient survivors or the army of the elves, as long as they are killed, they will not be able to hide.

The only ally is the Alpha Kingdom behind him. As for the other countries in the Northern Continent, they were directly ignored by George.

After all, the days of peace have passed for a long time. The biggest crisis usually faced is the infighting among nobles.

It's called war in name, but in fact, this kind of frontal Pk that shows off chariots and horses is a low-level "fight".

In a real war, how can thousands of people fight down and single-digit casualties?

Used to fight fake wars every day, these countries have long forgotten how real wars unfold.

Perhaps the few small countries that were hammered by orcs in the past few years have learned some lessons and paid a little attention to armaments.

But this effort is not enough in a real race war.

"Your Majesty, the Warhammer Kingdom lost many cities in the border area at the beginning of the war, and the current situation is probably not optimistic.

The situation in the Principality of Kantruo, the Principality of Ustad, and the Principality of Fick is even worse. The elves have already panicked without doing anything.

Once the army of elves invades, they will probably fall within half a year.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has already communicated with several major powers in the mainland. Except for the Alpha Kingdom, which clearly stated that it would provide assistance, the rest of the countries have refused on the grounds that they are also fighting.

I'm afraid it's…”

Before Earl Renato finished speaking, the Minister of Military Affairs on the side added:

"Count Renato, you are too optimistic. If the elves really send troops, let alone they can't last for half a year, even if we can't last for half a year.

Based on the situation of the Duchy of Kantruo, Duchy of Ustad, and Duchy of Fick, they were able to hold back the elf army for a month, which is regarded as an outstanding contribution to the human race.

Once the elves and the ancient survivors join forces, it will be a matter of time before the Warhammer Kingdom falls. Optimistically, it is estimated that they can last for half a year.

It's not because of how capable they are, but because it takes a lot of time to occupy their vast territory. "

Earl Martins' words deeply hurt everyone.

At other times, this must be a model of low EQ. But at this time, it is the most rational answer.

As the Minister of Military Affairs, he must always remain rational in times of crisis for the Principality.

Any unrealistic optimism will lead the Principality of Moxi to a point of no return.

"Prime Minister, what do you think of the current situation?"

George asked calmly.

When the orcs besieged the city and the principality was at stake, he persisted through the years, how could he be intimidated by things that didn't happen.

A true warrior who dares to face the bleak reality.

Originally, George was very ordinary in the era of the crown prince, but since he took the throne, the Principality of Moxi has always been in troubled times. The more things I experienced, the more I grew up.

The current situation is in crisis, but when will the situation in the Principality of Moxi not be in crisis?

After cleaning up the mess of the orcs, the debt crisis followed; after the debt crisis was resolved, several kingdoms in the middle were ready to move again.

The outbreak of the Continental War made the above crises not a problem, and the threat of the elves and the ancient survivors came again.

Born in sorrow.

Being in crisis every day, George got used to it after a long time.

"Your Majesty, let's wait for the Alpha Kingdom's decision now!

Ding Buwang, even if the elves really invaded, they probably wouldn't come out in full force, at most they would send out some clansmen whose lifespan was nearing the end of their lives.

If the Alpha Kingdom is willing to join forces with us, it should be able to prevent them from joining forces with the ancient survivors.

The trouble now is that the orcs are also moving. Once the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland are defeated, a large part of the energy of the Alpha Kingdom will be restrained by the orcs.

…”

Prime Minister Herceg said anxiously.
Chapter 388:
The King Chapter 388: Misfortune

After the Kingdom Conference ended, the Alpha Kingdom entered a wartime state again. But the measures being taken now are - only training but not mobilization.

According to the old rules, use the region as a unit to form large and small legions nearby to prepare for the next big battle.

Each county has a legion, small counties form small legions, and large counties form large legions. The original system of ten thousand legions was completely disrupted this time.

In the smallest remote county, a legion has only four to five thousand people; in the largest king's capital legion, it has an establishment of more than 40,000 people.

Wright County, where Hudson is located, is considered a large county in the southeastern province. According to the plan, it needs to provide a large army of 20,000 people, of which the mountain leader will contribute half, and the other half will be his own people.

Either another branch of the Koslow family, or a younger brother who mixed with Hudson. The entire Wright County, plus half of Wyton County, now belong to Hudson's sphere of influence.

This is not all, the branches of the Koslow family scattered all over the country are also a big force.

If you add them all up, it will not be difficult to pull out a team of 20,000 people.

After all, those who went to the battlefield with Master Hudson, and those who came back alive in the end, all earned money.

In addition to the upstarts who went to the north to develop, the family branches that stayed in place have also made considerable progress.

In addition to the normal expansion, there are also many lucky people who have inherited inheritance from their in-laws.

There is no way. Who would let you go to the battlefield with Master Hudson? Not only is it easier to gain military exploits, but the survival rate is also higher than that of other commanders?

Only by surviving can we be qualified to talk about development.

The most important factor for Hudson to successfully become the head of the family and suppress the gang of elders in the major branches is that he brought substantial benefits to everyone.

If you are like some prodigal sons and take your family to the front line, your entire army will be wiped out. Not to mention becoming the head of the family, it is good for relatives not to become enemies.

Because of the cost, the current training must be in various places, but when the war breaks out in the future, it is still necessary to find a way to gather people together.

Different from the ease of coordination last time, it must be much more difficult to coordinate this time.

Knowing that there are branches of the Koslow family under their command, everyone will not let them go easily. It's not to make things difficult on purpose, but to fight for a guarantee for myself.

Among other things, during his tenure as the commander-in-chief of the army, Hudson couldn't let "his own people" follow him to die for those missions that would lead to death?

Everyone has such small thoughts, but Hudson didn't take it to heart. If you can't coordinate now, it doesn't mean you won't be able to coordinate in the future.

What's more, putting a few branches under their command can make all the great nobles feel at ease, which is actually worth it.

Just as Hudson would not deliberately arrange for any army to die, these people also dare not let the Koslow family be used as cannon fodder.

Restricting each other can often make cooperation smoother. After all, the kingdom's army itself is the main force in this war, and the ministries must cooperate closely.

As soon as the general plan was finalized, Hudson's residence became lively. There is an endless stream of nobles who come to visit every day.

The daily entertainment makes people collapse. If the Ministry of Military Affairs did not strongly persuade him to participate in the formulation of emergency plans, he would have run away long ago.

"My lord, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland is visiting!"

Just as he was seeing off a guest, he received news that the prime minister was visiting late at night, and Hudson was also speechless.

"Please!"

After speaking, Hudson got up and went out to meet him in person. This is the meeting of the old prime minister, and it must be given enough.

After some politeness, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland got straight to the point and said: "Earl Hudson, there is no one else here, so don't have any worries, just speak up if you have any ideas!

I have already read the plan you put forward in the Ministry of Military Affairs. The situation in the North Continent hasn't collapsed to that point yet, has it? "

The kingdom is not very optimistic about the upcoming war. Unexpectedly, the plan given by Hudson was even more pessimistic than they expected.

Facing the strategy of the orcs, it is quite normal. But the strategy against the elves and the ancient survivors is terribly negative.

Even in Hudson's view, going deep behind enemy lines to wreak havoc is an active attack, but in the eyes of the nobles, this is passive avoidance of war.

In the history of the continent of Aslant, there has never been a precedent for guerrilla warfare. Only the remnants of the defeated and destroyed forces will lurk in search of opportunities to sabotage.

"Prime Minister, this war is different from the past. There are indications that the countries in the southern and central parts of the mainland want to completely wipe out the alien races within their respective spheres of influence.

Elves can watch the alien alliance lose, but it doesn't mean they will sit back and watch the alien alliance fall. At a critical moment, they are likely to choose to pull the alien alliance.

Your Excellency knows how strong the elves are. As long as they change their strategy, it will be difficult for the North Continent to stop their troops.

What's more, there are ancient survivors and orcs in the North Continent. Once the three major alien races join forces, there is no chance of winning against us head-on.

The only hope is to exchange space for time, extend the enemy's front as much as possible, increase the difficulty of their logistics supplies, and drag down the war.

Thundering measures were taken against the orcs because they were injured in the last war. Not only did the five royal families suffer heavy losses, but those vassal races also suffered even greater losses.

There is not enough cannon fodder, and the crowd tactics that the orcs liked most in the past can no longer be used. The five royal families dare not take their few members to fight with us.

It only takes a few battles to make them realize this, and they will fall into a strategic stalemate.

The elves and the ancient survivors have strong individual forces, but after all, they have been away from the mainland battlefield for a long time. Both their tactical thinking and the commanding ability of the officers are seriously lagging behind.

10 points of military strength, in their hands, they can play at most five or six points.

What's more, the number of their clansmen is limited, and they can only mobilize hundreds of thousands of troops. Even if the North Continent is thrown out, they will not be able to control such a large territory.

There are so many noble castles along the way, you need to pull out one by one. With the little troops in their hands, they couldn't finish it in a while.

If we really do that, we have nothing to do. It is estimated that before they finish pulling out the nails on the road, the Continental War will end first.

If they want to support the alien alliance, their only choice is to abandon the aristocratic castles in the countryside, only control the main cities along the way, and forcefully open a passage.

This is our chance to fight back. It is only necessary to send out a small group of troops, unite the remaining nobles from various countries, and rely on the country castles to attack their logistics lines.

If conditions permit, those experienced slave catchers can also be sent to go deep into the elf forest to wreak havoc in order to contain their forces.

Of course, this is an option in extreme cases. The elves are not easy to mess with. If they are really provoked, the kingdom will not be able to stand up.

If they don't borrow a route from the kingdom and choose to cross into the central continent from those countries in the west, then there is no need to take these extraordinary measures. "

Hudson said indifferently.

One will succeed and ten thousand bones will die.

As the general of the Alpha Kingdom, his first consideration is the interests of the kingdom, and the second is the mainland battlefield.

After being silent for a while, the prime minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, slowly nodded and said, "You are right, the orcs are the biggest threat to us.

There are at least 100 million humans distributed in the northern continent. With the strength of the light elves and ancient survivors, even if they were allowed to kill them, how much could they kill?

What's more, now that my human race is the overlord of the mainland, they still have to worry about being settled by the autumn queen, and they will definitely take care of it when they start their hands.

After all, not all alien races are as reckless as orcs, without considering the consequences. "

Obviously, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland chose to support Hudson's plan. On the surface, it seems a little cowardly, and even suspected of betraying allies, but it is indeed feasible strategically!

If you act according to the plan, the countries along the way can completely abandon the cities that are destined to be untenable, and evacuate people to the countryside to preserve their strength.

As for the impact on the continental war of letting the elf army go, I can only say I'm sorry.

If the major powers in the south-central region are willing to divide their troops to support, no matter how difficult the battlefield is, Hudson will not come up with such an idea.

However, these countries have regarded the countries of the Northern Continent as abandoned children from the very beginning. In order to survive, then don't blame everyone for messing up.

It can't be considered a complete failure. According to Hudson's plan, the Alpha Kingdom will still intercept the orc army and contribute to the continental war.

National countries in the northern continent will also attack the logistics supply lines of the elves and the ancient survivors. The specific effect is unknown for the time being, but at least it proves that everyone is still insisting on resistance.

Theoretically speaking, as long as the central and southern countries are strong enough, they can also play a game of beating dogs behind closed doors, and bury the elves and ancient survivors on the battlefield together.

"Prime Minister, things are not that simple. Whether the countries in the Northern Continent can understand our intentions is still unknown. Even if they see it, they may not be willing to give up.

Being able to survive from the ancient times, the elves and the ancient survivors are not fools. Even if we can't see it in the early stage, we can see through our plan in the later stage.

There are two strategies in front of them: either follow the route we set, go all the way south to reinforce the alien alliance; or unite with the orcs to destroy the kingdom first, occupy the northern continent in one fell swoop, and form a new pattern of confrontation between the north and the south.

The kingdom is still under great pressure. Once the worst happens, we can only concentrate our superior forces first and beat the orcs desperately to have a chance! "

Hudson said pretending to be bitter.

The more you know, the more pressure you will be under. Originally, he was responsible for it alone, but now that the Grand Duke of Newfoundland has sent it to his door, it just happened to bring one more unlucky guy into the water.

If there is no accident, all the high-level officials in the kingdom will fall into this kind of "anxiety" in the next few days.

There is no option to surrender. The more anxious everyone is, the more they can rely on Hudson in the military.

Naked conspiracy, Hudson is not afraid of being known at all. After all, he is the only general in the entire Alpha Kingdom who can command millions of troops.

"Don't worry, Your Excellency, the kingdom will do its best to avoid the worst possible situation. However, you must still prepare for the worst.

If the situation gets out of hand, the orc empire will rely on you! "

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland said with a serious face.

It could be seen that he was quite frightened. Originally, he just felt the pressure, but he didn't expect that the Alpha Kingdom was on the verge of life and death.

No one knows what those elves think, but in the context of the end of the alien alliance, in order for the race to survive, it is indeed possible for the three major alien forces to abandon their conflicts and jointly occupy the North Continent.

At that point, the only choice is to deal with the orcs first. Prior to this, the only thing Alpha Kingdom could do was "direct disaster to the south".

Anyway, the Kingdom of Alpha and the three major kingdoms of the Central Continent are also rivals. Taking the opportunity to trick them, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland has no pressure at all.

The resulting political consequences do not need to be considered for the time being. Only the surviving forces need to consider political issues.

Anyway, in Hudson's view, as long as the human race wins the continental war again and there is no threat from alien races, the human race alliance will fall apart.

At that point, the "united survival" has receded into the background, and big mergers are the mainstream of the times.

…

As if overnight, war became the mainstream of the mainland. Regardless of the countries that have already started fighting, all countries on the mainland have embarked on the road of expanding their arms and preparing for war.

As the benchmark of the Northern Continent, once the Alpha Kingdom made a move, all countries followed suit.

Among them, the Principality of Moxi was the most active. King George, who was confused, simply ordered to copy the Alpha model.

Just a few years ago, I dug out a wave of footholds from the Alpha Kingdom, and brought in the experience. Now I just need to promote it.

One reserve army in one county, with as many troops as possible. Even the young and mature population that was hidden in the past has been brought out this time.

In the blink of an eye, the army of the Principality of Moxi on paper returned to its peak.

The defense line in the border area has also started a new round of reinforcement. The Moxi nobleman, who suffered a loss once, went to supervise the construction by himself this time, and would never allow the bureaucrats to stretch out their hands.

Facts have proved that social beatings can make people progress the most. It is also copying the mobilization mechanism of the Alpha Kingdom, and the one that has really been implemented is the Moxi Principality, which has been severely beaten.

The Principality of Orton.

The mobilization order was also issued immediately, but their actions were much slower than those of the resident.

Of course, the speed is slow, but everyone still acted. The feudal nobles from all over the country also followed suit, and they did not passively sabotage their work.

It's just that this obviously doesn't satisfy Orton XIX. In normal times, he, the king, is a salted fish, but in times of crisis he becomes a living fish again.

"Trash!"

"Everything is trash!"

"What does the Ministry of Military Affairs do?

Why did it take so long for the order to be issued, and the formation of reserve corps in various places is still a mess?

If you can't do it yourself, why don't you just copy it?

Don't forget, this war is different from the past!

There are not so many big countries in front of us, the Warhammer Kingdom has been abolished, and the army of the elves and the ancient survivors may come over at any time. "

Theory and practice are not the same thing after all. The Principality of Orton, which has been beaten once, has indeed given birth to a sense of crisis.

The problem is that they have been involved in the war for too short a time. The orc army just borrowed from their country, and before they understood what was going on, the enemy had already left.

If you want to talk about accumulating experience, then you will have more experience of losing battles, and then there will be no more.

"Your Majesty, the Ministry of Military Affairs cannot be entirely blamed for this matter. The training of reserve forces in various places has indeed begun.

The problem now is: people are called together, but we lack the experience of specific training.

In many areas, serfs died due to overtraining. Facts have proved that the training of serf soldiers is not the same as that of knights.

We are considering sending people to the Alpha Kingdom to learn experience, or directly recruiting military instructors from them to help us complete reserve training. "

Prime Minister Jacob helped explain.

"Then why are you still in a daze, if you have a way, hurry up and implement it!

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs, immediately send someone to coordinate the relationship. At this moment of crisis, the Alpha Kingdom would not fail to help. "

After finishing speaking, Orton XIX, who still felt that it was not enough, continued to add: "Not only do we have to learn, but we also send people to inform neighboring countries, so that they can also send people to study.

In this time of crisis, everyone is hurt. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs tried its best to convince countries that only by allowing more countries to participate in the preparations for war can we have a chance! "

If it is so profound, it will directly shock the officials. Everyone never imagined that the king who eats, drinks and plays every day, and doesn't take much care of things, actually has this kind of insight.

"Your Majesty, comprehensively learning the Alpha model in the military also means that we must move closer to them politically.

Especially the evaluation and employment of military instructors, let the Alpha people directly intervene in our army. Originally, they were the largest country in the Northern Continent, if this happened again, all countries in the Northern Continent would have to..."

Before Foreign Minister Dubs could finish speaking, Orton Nineteenth interrupted impatiently: "Okay, stop talking so much nonsense.

To put it simply, what you mean is nothing more than saying: Doing so will break the balance, and in the future the Alpha Kingdom will dominate the Northern Continent.

What is there to worry about?

These are all things in the future, let's live into the future first!

If the enemy's soldiers cannot be stopped, the Principality of Orton will no longer exist before the Alpha Kingdom dominates the Northern Continent.

The principality is almost gone, why do you want me to take care of the international situation? "

There is nothing wrong with it. After I die, let him be flooded!

If the Principality of Orton is gone, not to mention the possibility of the Alpha Kingdom to dominate the Northern Continent, even if it is to unify the Northern Continent, it doesn't matter about Orton XIX.

Things about the future should be considered in the future, and the right way is to take care of the present first.

What's more, the battlefield is full of uncertainties. A strong country can decline in a war, and a weak country can also rise in a war.

The universe is uncertain, everything is possible!
Chapter 389:
The King Chapter 389: Accelerated Warcraft Legion Program

All the international turmoil has nothing to do with Hudson. After completing the formulation of the emergency plan, he returned to the territory as quickly as possible.

War is a matter of the future. The most important thing right now is to deal with the group of Warcraft captives.

It is a well-known fact that wild monsters are difficult to domesticate. Hudson doesn't think he has the aura of domineering, and he can make these monsters surrender as soon as he shows up.

Even if he really has this ability, it is useless. What Hudson needs is for these monsters to sign contracts with their subordinates, not with themselves.

The lower the level of Warcraft, the easier it is to admit death. Their limited IQ is simply not enough to support thinking.

If the contract cannot be completed, then these monsters can only be kept locked up, waiting to be used as breeding beasts.

Not to mention wasting resources, feeding is also a big problem.

If you don't pay attention, even if you jump out, you can turn the territory upside down.

In the end, there are more ordinary people in the mountain leaders. Even if there are hundreds of knights, most of them are low-level knights.

…

"Have you found a solution?"

Hudson asked concerned.

"No!

During the days when you left, the few of us searched all the information, but still couldn't find a reliable solution.

According to the records in the data, except for God's Chosen One like you, the best way for ordinary people to sign a contract with Warcraft is to subdue them.

Can only be singled out, and no external force can be used. Otherwise, Warcraft will not be convinced.

Even if they win, the probability of Warcraft surrendering will not exceed one-third. There are no rules, and whether the contract can be successfully signed depends entirely on luck.

Theoretically speaking, a special contract can also be used to force a contract to be signed.

However, such scrolls rarely appear on the market, and occasionally appear at auctions, and the price will not be lower than five thousand gold coins.

It is said that these contracts can only be contracted with low-level monsters. If the middle and high-level monsters are forcibly contracted, there is still a risk of backlash. "

Redman said helplessly.

In the continent of Aslante, everyone has a dream of being a Warcraft knight, and he is no exception.

Looking at a group of magical beast cubs, Redman was envious for a long time. If it weren't for Hudson's persuasion that low-level monsters didn't fit his status, he would have become a daddy of monsters.

After finally waiting for the opportunity, I found out embarrassingly that I was too high or too low.

With the strength of his great knight, low-level monsters can win, but they don't match his status; mid-level monsters are worthy of his status, but he can't beat them!

(low level 1~3, middle level 4~6, great knight 4)

"Father, don't worry, since the monster is in our hands, it won't be able to fly out.

For low-level monsters, arrange people to challenge them. Whoever gets the approval of the monster will be their mount.

If you are unwilling to surrender, then continue to challenge with substitutions. If you can't do it once, you can do it twice, and if you can't do it twice, you can do it three times. Slowly consume them.

As for the eight mid-level monsters, I will ask Bear Stearns to find a chance to talk with them, maybe one day they will figure it out.

When the time comes, your mount will definitely not be missing. "

Hudson comforted him.

It seems that Hudson looks calm, but in fact Hudson has nothing in his heart.

Intermediate monsters have a certain amount of intelligence and can communicate normally, but that doesn't mean they have a good temper.

There are many people who would rather die than submit. If a few words can convince them, the number of Warcraft knights will not be so small.

Use magic to enforce the contract, forget it!

Not only the high cost, but also the high risk. If there is a backlash on the battlefield, it will be fatal.

Instead of doing this, it is better for everyone to challenge, just as an actual combat training.

If it weren't for the lack of masters under his command, Hudson, a mid-level monster, would also like to arrange it that way.

It's a pity that the power system of the Mountain Territory is broken. Both the high-end combat power and the grass-roots combat power are not bad, but the middle part is vacant.

The gap in this part can only be filled by time. Even if he could poach the wall, Hudson didn't dare to use it.

Whether it is knight cultivation or magic cultivation, it consumes a lot of resources.

The declining little nobles simply cannot afford to support this level of masters. Hudson is worried about the masters who are involved with the big nobles.

Bring these people in to take power, maybe one day when they return from a long trip, the territory will change owners.

"Oh well!

Hudson, tell Bear Stearns. If you can't agree, you can't swallow my magic beast in one gulp. "

Redman said uncertainly.

Mid-level monsters have tempers, and high-level monsters have even stronger tempers. The bear of the earth is also a representative of violent temper, and it is also the nature of the race to fight when there is a disagreement.

But Bear Stearns is obviously an exception. Perhaps because of the influence of Hudson since he was a child, he prefers to use his brain first when encountering things.

On the contrary, it was Maxim's temper, which was more uncontrollable.

"Don't worry, I will watch from the sidelines, and no beast will be killed."

Hudson immediately promised.

It is not easy to catch a few mid-level monsters and bring them back. He has paid a lot of money, how can he let them die so easily?

…

After the episode, Hudson stepped into the laboratory again. As one of the few pharmacists in the territory, he also undertakes the important task of refining life essence and magic beast growth potion.

There are no substitutes. The magician group in the Mountain Territory has a good name and is essentially a senior handyman.

It is impossible for Hudson to spend a lot of resources on a group of guys with limited talents and unknown loyalty.

In order to form the Warcraft Legion as soon as possible, the "Scroll of Warcraft Contract" has also become his research topic.

The magic contract scroll is not easy to use, but it does not mean that it can be used. If you encounter some stubborn low-level monsters, you still have to use one.

Regardless of other factors, arrangements must be made for the convenience of breeding and breeding needs.

The lord's family has no food surplus, and the price of this kind of magic scroll, which is not worried about selling, has been floating in the sky.

However, there is a great demand for the mountain territory. In addition to the monsters in his hands, Hudson also issued a monster acquisition task in the mercenary union.

As long as it is a female animal with normal fertility, the mountain leaders are willing to buy it. Anyway, even if the mother body is a Tier 1 monster, it can reach Tier 3 with the blessing of the dragon's bloodline.

If it is a fire-type monster of the same attribute, the cubs after hybridization may still be able to cross the middle-level threshold.

These are the experiences summed up in the previous breeding process. The major forces can produce so many female beasts, but in fact most of them are Tier 1 monsters.

There is no other reason, just because the first-order monsters have the strongest reproductive ability, the largest number, the widest distribution, and the easiest to be caught.

If there is no continental war, it is estimated that Hudson will slowly accumulate female beasts, and let Maxim breed again when the number is almost the same.

But it is different now. The complicated situation makes Hudson feel that it is necessary to speed up the construction of the Warcraft Legion. In addition to issuing missions to acquire female beasts, he is also preparing to go out to capture monsters.

He has experience in raising magical beast cubs. Bear Stearns is the best case. With sufficient energy management, the original journey of hundreds of years was completed in a few years, and no side effects were found.

Earth Bear is like this, let alone other low-level Warcraft cubs, the growth time will only be shorter.

It is completely feasible to mature an army of Warcraft within a year or two.

It's a bit faster, but everyone can accept it. After all, the adulthood time of low-level monsters is not long, the shortest is six or seven years, and the longest is ten or twenty years.

With the current level of ripening potions on the mainland, it only takes three or four years for a low-level magical beast cub to grow up from birth to adulthood.

If the dosage is recklessly increased without considering the sequelae, it can be ripened within two years.

The problem of sequelae, that is something in the future, and it will not explode immediately.

When everyone realized that something was wrong and found that the Warcraft Legion in the Mountain Territory was unusual, it would be many years later.

Fearing that the efficacy of the potion will be leaked and being peeped at now does not mean that there will be such worries in the future. In the final analysis, the world is always dominated by the strong.

The only problem is the cost. The natural growth of monsters is to absorb energy from the world. Relying on the potion to accelerate the ripening is to pour energy directly into the monster's body to speed up the growth process.

Waste in the process of energy conversion is inevitable. It is impossible to create an adult monster with the energy of a magic core.

The specific consumption standard still varies from beast to beast.

Before reaching the limit of the bloodline of the monster itself, as long as there is enough energy, it can be promoted all the way.

For example, Bear Stearns, the speed of absorbing energy has dropped a lot.

An adult Earth Bear can become a Bear King not just by relying on energy, but also needs to understand the rules.

The road ahead, any earth bear can cross it when it grows up.

Now is the time to really test your talent.

Whether it is a "Xiong Cai" or a "Xiong Cai", you will know if you can pass this level.

Maxim is slightly better, but he is also about to reach the bottleneck.

Hudson is also at a loss as to the cultivation at the sanctuary level. He had only seen it in an ancient book, and it was the second level of the legendary sanctuary.

There is no relevant information from the outside world. It is because the number of sanctuary powerhouses in the human world is too small, and even fewer can cross the second level.

It's not that everyone lacks talent, but the main reason is that human life span is too short. Warcraft can spend thousands of years grinding in one realm, and humans are completely incomparable.

Even if one breaks through the sanctuary, it is difficult to live to be three hundred years old.

Once the body organs are aging, even if there is some understanding, the body cannot support a breakthrough to a higher level.

In fact, even the sanctuary realm is now a hurdle for countless heroes of the human race.

Judging from the records of the last millennium, the strong humans who were able to break through the sanctuary were all during the continental war.

Heroes are born in troubled times, and perhaps only through the tempering of blood and fire can a truly strong man be born.

One after another, the animal skins were reduced to crumbs in Hudson's hands, which still could not shake his determination to study the "contract".

After countless failed attempts, Melissa on the side finally couldn't help it: "Hudson, why don't you try me instead!"

After hesitating for a moment, Hudson nodded a little embarrassedly, and then gave up the test bench.

Confidence needs to be set off. If a person keeps failing, he will definitely collapse after a long time.

It's different if someone fails with you.

In terms of alchemy and pharmaceuticals, their husband and wife are at the same level, and they are both representatives of people who are addicted to vegetables.

Melissa has no reliable research and development results, and Hudson has a lot of research and development results, but that is based on cheating.

The only consolation is that, according to Melissa, most magicians are like this.

Anyone who can produce results can be called: alchemist, alchemist...

If there are many reliable results, or if the formula of the predecessors is improved, then they can be crowned with the title of "Master".

In the eyes of the outside world, Hudson is a magic potion master.

This is also the motivation for Melissa to persist in research and development. After all, with such a good pharmacy master by her side, it is easy to feel that I can do it myself.

Hudson fully supports this hobby.

There is no way, the circle of nobles is too chaotic. Few of those ladies who are like courtesans are clean.

Letting Melissa hang out with those people every day, it is really hard for him to rest assured, it is better to stay in the laboratory and toss.

At worst, we will lose some raw materials, which Master Hudson can afford.

Besides, Melissa is not completely unproductive, and some simple healing potions can still be made.

There is still some distance from the balance of payments, but overall the loss is not much. Almost a thousand and eight hundred gold coins are paid out every month, which can be regarded as the normal expenses of a lady.

With a sound of "噗嗤", the animal skin lying on the test bench immediately burst into flames.

Experienced Melissa threw a water polo technique and extinguished the fire in time.

The speed was so fast that even Hudson didn't have time to react.

"Let's stop here today. I'll go to the Arcane Academy later, ask those old guys for advice, and then come..."

Before Hudson could finish speaking, Melissa clung to his arms and said excitedly: "Take me, those people are great magisters!

If those students know that I have the opportunity to ask the great magister for advice, they will definitely be jealous..."

There is nothing wrong with it, the great magister is too far away from the life of ordinary people.

Even Melissa, a nobleman with an extraordinary background, the instructors at the Magic Academy are nothing more than mages (level 5), and some lecturers are even just great magicians.

Not to mention the great magister, even the magister seldom comes out to give lectures. Even if they accept students, they only recruit those with outstanding talents, and ordinary students like Melissa are simply not available.

"What's the matter Hudson, if it's embarrassing, forget it."

Seeing that Hudson didn't answer, Melissa said regretfully.

"Of course not, I am also the honorary headmaster of the Arcane Academy, so I still have a bit of face with them.

I just didn't expect that our Miss Melissa is so hardworking, she has stayed in the magic academy for so long and has never even had contact with a great magister! "

Hudson teased.

"You, bully..."

…

Warhammer Kingdom.

With the joint efforts of all parties, the representatives of the two divided aristocratic camps, the East and the West, finally made it to the negotiating table.

Joseph II, who was on the main seat, looked embarrassed at the moment. I can't wait to dig a hole out of the ground and drill in directly.

As the king, he needs to bear the main responsibility for bringing the situation of the kingdom to this point.

Others play with balance in politics, so he also plays with balance. As a result, other monarchs consolidated the kingship, and he started a civil war.

Originally wanted to reconcile the contradictions between the two noble camps of the East and the West, but because of his vacillating positions, both sides were dissatisfied with him. So much so that the situation got out of hand, and the kingdom was on the verge of splitting.
Chapter 390:
The King Chapter 390: The Divided Kingdom and the Colosseum

"I invite everyone to come here today, mainly to discuss the future of the kingdom. Due to the civil war, our Warhammer Kingdom suffered heavy losses. At this moment, the foreign army..."

"snort!"

"snort!"

Before he finished speaking, he was interrupted by two consecutive cold shouts, and Joseph II was so angry that his face was livid.

He is the king of the Warhammer Kingdom. He never expected that his subordinates would be so shameless.

Even if you are having a family split, for the sake of the kingdom's face, you should put on a show in front of outsiders!

Unfortunately, the illusion of Joseph II was finally shattered. Representatives of the two camps expressed in practical actions that they did not want to recognize him as the king.

If it weren't for being bound by the rules of the game, it is unknown whether the king Joseph II would have survived to this day.

The reality is so cruel. The political balance seems to be played by every monarch, but not everyone can play smoothly. Once the game crashes, you have to bear the price of backlash.

"Everyone calm down, I invite you here today to solve the problem, not to intensify the conflict.

The army of the ancient survivors is pressing down on the land, and the elves are also ready to move. The Warhammer Kingdom has reached the most dangerous moment.

If you continue to make trouble like this, everyone should know what will happen next.

The reinforcements of the Human Race Alliance cannot be counted on in a short time, and now we can only rely on ourselves. "

Count Renato said seriously.

The division of the Warhammer Kingdom is what the Principality of Moxi wants to see, but the premise is to wait until after the Continental War instead of collapsing at this time.

The unified Warhammer Kingdom can hardly block the front of foreign soldiers, and the Warhammer Kingdom in civil strife is even more hopeless.

It can be delayed for a day. In order to buy time for his family, Earl Francis had to go to the countries of the Northern Continent to mediate the internal disputes of the Warhammer Kingdom.

"Count Renato, I let you see a joke today.

The kingdom has come to this point, all of us are responsible, but some people are always unwilling to admit it.

That's all!

Destined not to be the same people, instead of reluctantly getting together and fighting each other every day, it is better to simply separate. "

While speaking, the tears of Marshal Borg had already fallen. As the pillar of the Warhammer Kingdom, now he wants to split the kingdom he has fought for most of his life with his own hands, the feeling is really indescribable.

But there is no way, people can't help themselves in the aristocratic circle. As a representative of the nobles in the west of the kingdom, he must first safeguard the interests of the group.

Being suppressed by the eastern aristocrats for hundreds of years, it was hard to gain the upper hand once. As a result, not only did it fail to win more rights, but it triggered a civil war.

The situation has developed to this point, he has no way to retreat, and the interest groups behind him are pushing him forward as a spokesperson.

"Separate, separate, as if someone begged you to be together! You know how to fight for power all day long. Without you guys, the kingdom will only develop better!"

Prime Minister Gay fought against each other.

Since we are going to the opposite side, we cannot lose momentum. It has nothing to do with personal preferences, everyone is backed by interest groups, and he also has no choice.

In the blink of an eye, the negotiations reached an impasse. Separation is not as simple as talking about it, it also involves territory division.

The civil war has been fought, so it is no wonder that the border line can be agreed upon in a few words. If you get entangled around this issue, things will be troublesome.

"Calm down, both of you, whether or not to split up is your internal matter, as an outsider, it is inconvenient for us to interfere.

But you have to think clearly about one thing. Now that the alien army has overwhelmed the country, the Kingdom of Warhammer is at a critical juncture.

The army of the ancient survivors alone has made everyone tired of dealing with it. If the elves send troops again, it will be even more troublesome.

At this critical moment, we need to temporarily abandon the contradictions and unite to tide over the difficulties.

If you can't do this, then you can take a gamble to see if the alien army will show mercy to your subordinates!

No matter how big the conflict of interest is, it must survive first. You should think about it carefully, the time left for us is running out. "

Count Gustavo tried hard to persuade.

As the Alpha Kingdom's envoy to the Warhammer Kingdom, he is now on a mission. The life and death of the Warhammer Kingdom is not important, the key is to buy time for oneself.

If the people in front of them persist for one more day, the Alpha Kingdom will have one more day to prepare. Against this background, he naturally didn't want to see the situation get into trouble.

"Count Gustavo, there is nothing wrong with the reasoning, but some issues are not clearly explained now, and will be even more unclear in the future.

Leaving aside other issues, who will the king follow after the separation?

Can't our two families continue to co-host?

Forget it, let's be generous. In view of your heavy losses in the orc invasion, let His Majesty the King follow you.

It happens that the royal family's territory is mostly concentrated in the eastern region, and the family is divided directly by region, so there is no need to be entangled in this issue. "

Marshal Borg said with a look of disgust.

The big deal is downgrading from a kingdom to a principality. As long as you can get rid of Joseph II, it's worth paying a little price.

The western nobles are unwilling to want Joseph II as king, but it does not mean that the eastern nobles welcome him.

During the last orc invasion, both the Alpha Kingdom and the Principality of Moxi handed over their armies to the most capable generals, but Joseph II, in order to play a political balance, went to the imperial conquest.

The king personally leads troops to the battlefield, which is also the norm in the continent of Aslante, and there is nothing wrong with it.

But once the battle is lost, there will be problems everywhere. Joseph II, who had ruined his family, naturally became the most unpopular person.

Even if you want to get rid of the blame, he is the one who rushed to be the coach, and he personally gave the order, so naturally he has to bear the responsibility for the failure.

"Marshal Borg, you can't say that. Our political system is mature, the government team is stable, and we can operate without anyone. Compared with you, you need Your Majesty to preside over the overall situation.

Everyone has been friends for many years. At this time, how can we take advantage?

Your Majesty, there is no need to worry. The land of the royal family can also be replaced. We passed it in a short while, which happened to solve the current territorial conflict problem by the way.

…”

As soon as Prime Minister Guy's words came out, everyone was instantly dumbfounded. After a long time, the focus of conflict between the East and West camps in the Warhammer Kingdom turned into "I don't want a king".

A king can be disliked to this extent, and Joseph II can be regarded as a historical precedent. Needless to say, abdicate directly!

Thinking about Joseph II's showy operations in the past few years, even the royalists have nothing to say.

If he hadn't insisted on going his own way, with the strength of the Warhammer Kingdom, he wouldn't have lost so badly in the war.

If they had responded positively from the beginning, they had every hope of keeping most of the kingdom's territory and not being baptized by the flames of war.

Eastern nobles hated Joseph II's blind command, causing them to lose their hometown; Western nobles hated him for using the coalition of western nobles as cannon fodder in order to maintain balance.

If this kind of thing happened, he should take the initiative to admit his mistake, abdicate and take responsibility, so as to ease domestic conflicts. It's a pity that Joseph II is just stubbornly dominating the position and refusing to give up.

In the subsequent reconstruction work, Joseph II continued to pursue his balanced strategy, and carried out the show operation to the end, so that the royalists did not want to speak.

Renato and Gustavo looked at each other, and both of them showed helpless expressions. Asking the king to abdicate is also taboo.

It's not that he is worried about offending Joseph II, but mainly because of his boss's thoughts. If it hurts him to be missed, it will be a blood loss.

They don't mind leaving and slamming doors if they can get out of the way. However, the situation on the battlefield requires them to reconcile the internal conflicts of the Warhammer Kingdom. Even if they know that mixing such things will not lead to good results, they can only bite the bullet.

"Your Majesty, what do you think of this matter?"

Count Renato asked angrily.

It is a miracle for the king to be in this position. Renato was very skeptical that if Joseph II continued to toss, he would be able to send himself to the guillotine.

Of course, the greater possibility is sudden death. Since the end of the Holy See era, there has been no precedent for the execution of a king in the continent of Aslante.

"snort!"

After a cold drink, Joseph II slapped the table and said: "Haven't you already made arrangements, why are you asking me?

Don't you just want me to abdicate, as long as the unity of the kingdom can be maintained, I can make concessions! "

In the past, this was definitely a heartfelt sacrifice, but unfortunately now that the two factions have joined forces to force the palace, there is no room for maneuver in the matter.

"In this case, let the eldest prince and the second prince succeed!

For the sake of fairness, the royal family is directly divided into two, and we will draw lots to decide which prince will be the monarch on which side. "

Marshal Borg said exhausted.

There is nothing crueler than destroying the kingdom you have fought for most of your life with your own hands. But things have developed to this point, separation is already the best choice.

In past civil wars, both sides were stained with each other's blood, barely sitting together would only make the conflict more acute.

Divide into two directly, with more royal leaders as a buffer, both sides have a chance to calm down and think about how to deal with the alien invasion.

"good!"

"good!"

…

A series of cheers formed a critical blow to Joseph II, and he fainted on the spot.

Frightened, everyone hurriedly called the pastor to rescue him. It doesn't matter if the joint-stock country is separated. If the king is forced to death, it will be in big trouble.

Essentially, the two sides chose two princes to succeed to the throne in order to avoid being charged with "rebellious officials and thieves". If Joseph II died here, it would be in vain.

Fortunately, it was just anger. Under the priest's treatment, Joseph II recovered his life. It's just that the whole body has been severely injured, and it is no longer as high-spirited as before.

…

The news that the Warhammer Kingdom was split into two spread, and soon caused a major earthquake in the continent of Aslant. Although they still retain their titles and consider themselves orthodox, everyone knows that another kingdom has fallen.

"Eastern Warhammer Kingdom" and "Western Warhammer Kingdom", as you can tell by their names, this is the result of a compromise between the two parties.

In normal times, the countries of the human race must intervene! If you play so capriciously, where will the royal power go?

Even if the Warhammer royal family still inherits the throne, everyone knows that there is a high probability that the two new kings who have been released from the pink oven will be emptied.

There is no chance to struggle, and the royal family's fortune was ruined by Joseph II. The remaining bit of strength, being able to keep the royal inheritance, is the result of everyone giving face.

What the monarchs of various countries think, Hudson does not know, anyway, he is very satisfied with the current situation of the Warhammer Kingdom.

Sometimes "1+1" is not equal to 2. After the two conflicting interest groups are separated, the chances of pitting each other against each other are reduced, but they can play a greater role on the battlefield.

The next step is to protect their own interests, not afraid of their carelessness. Even if the Warhammer Kingdom falls, there will still be many noble castles that will survive.

The ancient survivors are just a collective term. I am afraid that only they can figure out how many races there are in them.

There are more people and more things, not to mention a multi-racial alliance. At the time of fighting the world at this moment, we can still fight together because of interests. After the results are achieved, it will be time to fall apart.

Not every race has ambitions. Most of the ancient survivors just want to get a piece of land suitable for survival, and almost none of them want to compete for the hegemony of the mainland.

It's not that these people have no ambitions, it's that the ethnic population is limited. Especially for those small clans with a population of only tens of thousands, let them fight for hegemony on the mainland, do you really think they are per capita dragons?

In Hudson's view, as long as the Warhammer Kingdom survives the first wave, the ancient survivors will be divided.

Realizing that the human race is difficult to deal with, some unambitious races will choose to accept it as soon as it is good, and turn to attack to clean up the rear.

For the Alpha Kingdom, one less enemy means more chances of winning. Even if it is only a few small races, it may be the last straw that breaks the camel's back at a critical moment.

Standing on the pavilion, watching the knights challenge World of Warcraft in the arena, and looking down at the cheering crowd below, Hudson found that opening a "Colosseum" is not bad.

After the knights in their own territory have finished their challenges, they can also relax the restrictions, and use the slogan that whoever defeats the monsters will belong to them, so as to attract knights from the outside world to challenge.

Not only can you sell tickets, but you can also charge a registration fee.

Anyway, the remaining monsters are all diehards among beasts, and they are not so easy to surrender. Even if they win, it is mostly for nothing.

It's okay if you don't want to pay, as long as you help out once. Hudson is not demanding, just follow along during the Continental War.

"Mr. Jose, you are from the capital, how much do you know about the Colosseum?"

Hudson asked concerned.

Although the plan is good, it needs people to implement it. There is a colosseum in the entire southeastern province, that is, Beida City, which can explain many problems.

If it was easy to make money in this industry, nobles from all over the world would have followed suit, so it wouldn't be possible that it hasn't been promoted until now.

"Count, the operation of the Colosseum is very simple, it is nothing more than a field, plus "beast" and "human".

In the case of mountain territories, it is not difficult to meet these conditions, the key lies in the difficulty of making profits.

Relying solely on ticket revenue can at most save capital, and the real money is the gambling commission.

In addition, selling some food, providing special services, and compensation after fights are also important sources of income.

From the actual situation of the territory, unless the Colosseum is placed in Dadir City to attract nobles from neighboring counties to come and watch, it will be difficult to achieve a balance of income and expenditure. "

After listening to Jose's analysis, Hudson was also helpless. The mountain collar seems to have all internal organs, but this sparrow is too small after all.

Light industry is textiles, and heavy industry is ironmaking. But these are handicraft workshops, and the workers are completely attached to him, the lord.

Consumption power is a joke. Even if Hudson is willing to find gold as wages, these people can't spend it, or are reluctant to spend it.

On the premise that the lord provides basic necessities, food, housing and transportation, everyone's consumption desire is almost equal to zero.

Of course, their shriveled pockets also determine their low desires. Life goal: to have a full meal, and further pursuit: to eat a good meal.

Spiritual pursuit, maybe tickets can be issued as rewards. After all, who can't rely on a group of guys who can't afford a few copper coins to spend.

Increasing everyone's income, changing the ration system to cash payment, that can only be thought about.

Most of the income from the territory was used by Hudson to invest in the construction of the territory, and a small part was used to support the army.

The mountainous territories are still in a fiscal deficit, so how can there be any surplus value, which can be used for distribution!

If the internal purchasing power is not enough, the external purchasing power will also fail to rise. Seeing that the mainland war is approaching, the nobles are busy expanding their armies and preparing for war. Who has spare money to spend?

"Then put the Colosseum in Dardir City!

The rest of these monsters are stubborn. They have been defeated more than a dozen times in a row, but they have no intention of surrendering.

Threats and lures, we have also tried, but it still has no effect, and the possibility of being recovered is already very low.

Simply take it out as a prize, attracting knights from all over the world to challenge. According to our rules, whoever can make the monster surrender after the fight, then give it to them.

The registration fee is set at 50 gold coins. With such a small amount of money, in exchange for a chance to become a monster knight, many people should be hooked.

After all, it is much safer to challenge in the arena than to go outside to try your luck.

As long as a few lucky ones succeed, the follow-up popularity will not worry.

In this way, even the money for hiring gladiators was saved. If it is run well, maybe the Colosseum can make some money.

Of course, whether the Colosseum can make money is not the point, the key is to be able to promote the spirit of martial arts! "

Talking is not the point, but when it comes to actual actions, it's all about money.

The more war years, the more valuable the goods that can enhance the strength. Taking Warcraft cubs as an example, the price has soared by 40% compared to before the continental war broke out.

This is because of the need for long-term cultivation, otherwise the price will rise even more fiercely.

There is a chance to get the master of an adult monster, even if it is only a low-level monster, the little nobles will also flock to it.

Compared to ordinary knights, Warcraft knights have more advantages no matter whether they make achievements or run away after losing battles.

Even if the success rate is low, there will be many people who can't help but come and try.

It seems that the one-time registration fee is not much, but there are not only one monsters left for them to challenge, and it is not a small sum of money after one round of fighting.

Besides, registration for the challenge is not immediately possible to make an appointment. The time spent queuing in the middle also requires a lot of consumption.

Whether it is basic necessities of life, or going to watch a few games, they are all contributing profits to Master Hudson.

If the income is good, Hudson doesn't mind not making this industry bigger and stronger, capturing more monsters and putting them in the Colosseum.

When necessary, you can also hook up the monsters and feed them some Hashi growth potions to stimulate the enthusiasm of the nobles to participate.

"Count, will the knights in the territory have any objections to doing this?

After all, our Warcraft Legion plan has just started, and there are still many knights who are eagerly watching. "

Jose said hesitantly.

As an outsider, there are usually many things to consider. Especially these things that touch the interests of the local knights have to be cautious.

"Don't worry, I will tell everyone about this matter. If anyone has an opinion, let him come to me. You only need to elect a person in charge of the Colosseum."

Hudson said calmly.

The lack of monsters is only a temporary thing. In recent days, neither Maxim nor Bear Stearns has been idle.

Go out early and return late every day, and even go out for several days in a row, just stepping on the Blackstone Mountains. When the situation is almost understood, it's time to act.

Of course, for the sake of safety, these monsters will not be sent to the mountain territory immediately, but will make a big circle from the outside.

Even if there are high-level magical beasts that follow the scent, they will go to other places first.

Besides, since you want to act, it is also a measured action. It's not that all the low-level monsters in a certain area are wiped out. If there are a few monsters in each area, it will not cause any waves at all.

Originally, monsters are also predators of the jungle. It is very common for high-level monsters passing by to grab a few low-level monsters to eat.

As long as they don't settle down for a long time to grab territory, the local high-level monsters won't care. Even if they met head-on, it was nothing more than a matter of fighting.

As long as you grasp the scale, things will be within the controllable range. The only problem is that in this way, the number of monsters that can be captured is limited.

But this is nothing, the number of knights in the mountain territory is not many. Even including the entire Koslow family, there are still not enough 800 knights.

Considering that the army still needs a commander, the Warcraft Legion only needs to have a staff of 300 people. Subsequent expansion of the establishment will have to wait for the younger generation to grow up.

Not all knights are eligible to challenge Warcraft. Those little guys who have just become knights are not opponents of Warcraft at all, they can only raise the cubs of Warcraft.

It seems that there is a large gap, but the actual demand is not as much as expected. The main purpose of continuing to capture monsters is to increase the survivability of the officers on the battlefield.

You must know that most of these people are brought out by Hudson alone. I dare not say how powerful the ability is, at least they all came out of the sea of ​​corpses and blood.
Chapter 391:
The King Chapter 391: Seedling Legion

Jade Palace, with the arrival of new letters for help, Caesar IV's tense nerves suddenly eased.

Compared to previous requests for money, food, equipment, and reinforcements, this wave of requests for help is much more pragmatic.

Finally, he knows that he needs to improve his own military strength, but he has never paid much attention to the military strength of the countries in the Northern Continent.

To put it bluntly, the Alpha Kingdom family can beat all the countries in the Northern Continent except themselves. But when it comes to manpower, financial resources, and material resources, these countries combined are more than twice that of the Alpha Kingdom.

Theoretically, by mobilizing all these countries, the fighting power of the two Alpha Kingdoms can be erupted.

Unfortunately this is only theoretical.

A country that has been born for war for a long time, and a group of countries that are used to living a peaceful life, cannot be at the same level in military terms.

If the Northern Continent can mobilize the combat power of the three Alpha Kingdoms, even if they are not opponents of the three major alien races, they will be able to protect themselves as the defensive side.

"The countries of the Northern Continent have made a request to us, hoping that the kingdom can send military personnel to help them train the army. Do you think this can be done?"

Caesar IV pretended to be reserved and asked.

"Your Majesty, it is the general trend to send people to support the countries, unite all the powers of the northern continent, and jointly resist the invasion of alien races.
