This matter is not only related to the safety of the Northern Continent, but also the rise and fall of the entire human race, and it will definitely have a profound impact on the future international situation! "

The Prime Minister of Newfoundland said righteously.

The opportunity to cultivate pro-Alpha faction in an upright manner was offered to the door, how could it be turned away?

Don't say it's helping people train the army. Even the last time they sent troops to rescue the Principality of Moxi, the Alpha Kingdom gained a stable ally.

In recent days, the Mountain Territory has received many letters from the capital, all of which are asking Hudson to hurry over to preside over military affairs.

"Reply to the capital and say that I will go there after I finish my work!"

Hudson said without changing his face.

The same excuse, he has used it many times. On the one hand, there are really many affairs in the territory, and on the other hand, it is a matter of power.

In name, he is the commander-in-chief of the kingdom's strategic mobilization, but there is no clear statement about the specific scope of power.

Even this strategic mobilization headquarters is a temporary organization, and the administrative level has not yet been determined.

Whether it is under the direct control of the king, or under the Ministry of Military Affairs, or only responsible to the noble council, there is no word on these.

Hudson also understood Caesar IV's approach. After all, it is easy to release power, but it is difficult to take it back.

If the power of the Strategic Mobilization Headquarters is too great, once it comes to wartime, all of them will be transferred to the wartime economic system, and he, the king, may be emptied.

Similar things have never happened in history. If Hudson was in the position of Caesar IV, he would not easily release his power.

Even if it is necessary to strategically mobilize the headquarters to work, the authority of this temporary agency must be limited, and at least the necessary checks and balances must be retained.

Knowing is knowing, but the **** decides the head. As the commander-in-chief of strategic mobilization, Hudson must fight for his rights.

If you don't know why, just go to work in the office, and you don't even think about it.

Anyway, the mobilization mechanism of the Alpha Kingdom is perfect, and it will not affect anything if he passes a few days earlier or a few days later.

The king was eager to urge him to take office, most likely because he was frightened by the international situation. The current strategic situation in the North Continent is really not optimistic.

Before the reinforcements sent by the Alpha Kingdom set out, two countries had already started the battle to defend the capital. The tragic ending is almost doomed.

Even if the reinforcements are sent over immediately, it will not change the overall situation. Now let's see how long these two unlucky guys can last.

In fact, the great nobles of the two countries have already arranged for backup and transferred most of the tribe. Staying and sticking to it now is just to give an explanation to the Race Alliance.

According to the laws formulated by the alliance, if you run away in the face of alien invasion, you will be deprived of the honor of the nobility.

The war has already left them with nothing. If they lose even the last fig leaf - "Glory of Nobility", they will really have no way to get along in the circle.

In the eyes of most people, the current defeat of the human race in the North Continent is only temporary. After winning the Continental War, the aliens still had to obediently spit out what they ate.

For thousands of years, everyone has played like this. According to the rules of the game, the territory lost now can be regained in the future.

…

"Boom!"

The sound of the magic crystal cannon pierced the sky and broke the silence of the sea. Looking at the warship that suddenly appeared in the distance, the middle-aged "Island Owner" said with a gloomy expression: "Organize a counterattack immediately!"

On someone else's territory, he wasn't ready to do anything. But the other party didn't give them a chance, and greeted them with magic crystal cannons as soon as they came up, even if they didn't want to fight.

After firing a cannon, the young officer who was in a state of ecstasy also realized that the situation was not good.

My own lonely warship actually ran out to fight with a group of pirates, this is not human affairs!

Gritting his teeth, the young officer immediately ordered: "Send a signal for help!"

Deep in his heart, he couldn't help feeling rejoicing. Fortunately, during the process of losing their souls, they were fighting pirates. If they moved the merchant ships that came and went, there would be no way to explain it later.

Now, as long as you insist that the pirates did it first, and then give some gifts to manage it, the matter of attacking without authorization will be over.

Of course, the premise is that he can support until reinforcements arrive. If he died in the hands of this group of unknown pirates, then everything would be over.

…

"Man beard, what's going on?

Didn't I ask you to be more cautious in your actions, why did you make such a noise? "

An old cang's voice came from behind, and the middle-aged island owner, Man Beard, was frightened and hurried forward to explain:

"My lord, this is none of our business! As soon as the warship on the other side came up, it fired at us directly, without even giving us a chance to negotiate.

You know that there are some people who hate pirates and shout and kill when they meet. Maybe the commander on the other side is this kind of person. "

Hearing this explanation, while nodding, the old man revealed a trace of disdainful contempt at the corner of his mouth, and said coldly: "Trash!

You can't do such a small thing well, but you still claim to be all over the world. If someone wants to die, send them down quickly.

Wasting time to entangle here, when reinforcements arrive in a while, it will be difficult to silence them! "

He said this on the lips, but he knew it very well in his heart. It is impossible to enter the village quietly, and this battle is bound to alarm the local snakes.

The strength of the pirate fleet depends on who it is compared with. Bullying ordinary businessmen is of course invincible. If you fight against some big nobles who have been engaged in maritime trade for many years, you may not be able to gain the upper hand.

The most important thing is that people can "call friends and friends". Once a fight starts, the sea power along the entire southeast coast will strangle them.

Generally speaking, when such a bad situation happens, the pirates will choose to retreat. They only come out to rob money, but they have no interest in competing with a kingdom's navy.

If there is something big behind the scenes, you can also ask someone to mediate the conflict. They are all hanging out in the sea, how can there be no friction, and they can see each other in the future after giving each other some face.

It is a pity that the identities of the old people cannot be revealed, otherwise they will only die faster.

Alpha Kingdom may not go to war because of a pirate, but if it knows that a pirate force controlled by the Holy See has appeared at its door, there is absolutely no room for negotiation.

Even if they said: no malicious intentions, even if they came to drop by, no one would believe it.

Hudson just pulled the reins, causing the situation to get out of control, forcing the Holy See and his party into an embarrassing situation.

"My lord, since the whereabouts have been exposed. Otherwise, let's go back first, and go to Dulong Island after the limelight passes..."

Before the middle-aged island owner finished speaking, the old man slapped his mouth wide and warned: "Man Beard, it seems that you have really improved a lot these years, and you dare to teach me how to do things.

Do your part well, and you don't need to worry about other things. I hope this is the first and last time.

Otherwise you will regret coming to this world! "

Recalling the old man's terrifying methods, Man Beard, who woke up from his trance, nodded hastily in fright.

At some point, there was a puddle of unknown liquid on the splint. Fortunately, the wind and waves at sea were strong enough, and the rising waves quickly covered it up.

If you let the younger brothers know that your boss still has such a cowardly side, I'm afraid they will immediately lose their minds.

After finishing the lesson, the old man returned to the cabin with a few people behind him, as if nothing happened just now.

Seeing a group of people leaving, Man Beard finally showed a resentful expression on his face, but this expression only disappeared for a moment, and then it was an expression of the rest of his life after a catastrophe.

Life and death are all in the hands of the people. Even if he becomes a famous pirate leader, he is still just a dispensable **** in the eyes of the other party.

No way, who made him a pirate?

Such an identity, in the eyes of ordinary people, is extremely vicious; but in the eyes of real big shots, he is like an ant that can be crushed to death at any time.

It is not that the Holy See does not have a fleet. They arranged for a group of them to accompany them. In addition to keeping their whereabouts secret, it is more because of this that going to Dulong Island requires a lot of cannon fodder to explore the way.

The Holy See's direct power is reluctant to lose, but it can only make them marginal characters unlucky.

Between the eyebrows, Man Beard showed a hint of ruthlessness. He has been working for the Holy See for so many years and still has no status. He has accumulated a lot of resentment.

If he hadn't known that the Holy See was too powerful, and he simply didn't have the ability to fight back, he would have retaliated a long time ago.

Recalling the legend of "Dragon Island", Man Beard's eyes lit up. If in this operation, Hu Holy See's harvest can be intercepted, maybe he can get rid of the current embarrassing situation.

The big deal is to lose this pirate group and reappear with a new identity. Now is the time of the Continental War, full of countless opportunities.

Choosing a country with a weak Holy See, waiting for an opportunity to join it, and obtaining an apparent noble status is more reliable than floating on the sea all the time.

…
Chapter 394:
The King Chapter 394: Unlucky

Beida City, Governor's Mansion.

When the news reached Earl Pierce, the war had already come to an end, leaving only groups of cold numbers.

" Pass down the order to get all the navy officers and soldiers on vacation to return to their positions and be ready to attack at any time.

Order all water surface forces along the coast of the southeastern province to pay close attention to the traces of this foreign pirate fleet and report the situation immediately.

The griffin cavalry in the territory were also sent out to search the sea. I don't believe that a fleet can fly from the sky! "

Earl Pierce ordered angrily.

At the door of his own house, he fought the enemy in a daze, and lost hundreds of navy officers and soldiers. In the end, he didn't even know the identity of the enemy.

After suffering such a big loss, how can the Dalton family still hang out at sea if they don't find out the enemy and kill them to make an example of them?

As for the cause of the conflict, it is no longer important now, and there is no reason to fight pirates.

"Uncle, the trade in the northern waters is underdeveloped, and the strength of the pirates entrenched is mostly limited. These pirates who don't know the rules should come from the central and southern seas.

Pirates rely on a deep understanding of the sea area, and generally stay in the area where they are active, and rarely act across borders.

This group of pirates suddenly went north, and it is understandable that our people did not find out in advance.

Although the fleet suffered a lot in the battle, it also proved our control over the southeast coast from the side.

Being able to find the traces of the enemy as soon as they broke in proves that the people below still put their heart into it.

If it weren't for this naval battle, the enemy would be exposed. If these guys attack our ports or overseas islands, they will be a big threat! "

Viscount Cayo spoke persuasively.

With Hudson's rise all the way, he, the sheriff of Wyton, was no longer in the fief, and went back to assist Earl Pierce in handling family affairs.

Half of the family needs for development, and the other half is forced out.

Governor Pierce was worried that his young nephew would be instigated by outsiders to do stupid things, so he simply put him by his side to train him.

Facts have proved that this decision is very correct. After handling government affairs for two years, Viscount Cayo's ability has also undergone earth-shaking changes.

"Alas, the situation is difficult!

The outbreak of the continental war is already very unfavorable to the family, but now a mysterious pirate has emerged, threatening our maritime interests.

That's all, let's clean up the pirates first. The direction of the continental war is not something we can decide.

There are not many places for pirates to hide on the southeast coast. As long as they don't leave, they will be able to find them.

Send someone to prepare a generous gift, and ask Earl Hudson to help.

Forget it, you might as well go there yourself. Lower your posture a little, even if you can't invite people, let the dragon go to the sea for a lap. "

Earl Pierce said solemnly.

During the peaceful era, the Dalton family was the overlord of the southeastern province, and their overall strength was able to hold down the Koslow family.

Farming step by step, this advantage can last for decades, or even hundreds of years.

But once it entered the war period, the situation changed.

The Koslow family, who were originally at a disadvantage, suddenly became special because of the existence of Hudson, a famous mainland general.

The change in the situation forced Earl Pierce to carefully handle the relationship between the two families. At the very least, you must ensure that you cannot leave it to the other party on the surface, for your own reasons.

"Uncle, it's just a group of pirates, there's no need to owe a favor, right?"

Kayo asked puzzled.

Although they suffered a lot in the previous sea, the sea power of the Dalton family was not seriously damaged.

In order to wipe out a group of pirates, asking for help from a competitor and sending a favor in vain is not worthwhile no matter how you look at it.

"Kayo, you are still immature!

Earl Hudson is not only the dragon knight, but also the commander-in-chief of the kingdom's strategic mobilization. He will also become the commander-in-chief of the kingdom's army in the future, and may even command the armies of various countries in the northern continent.

Such an identity is no longer something the family can suppress. Even if we want to suppress it, we can't find a suitable entry point, including our allies, who will not support us to take action now.

The more difficult the situation in the North Continent is, the more special Hudson's status becomes. All major forces in the kingdom are waiting for him to command the army at this moment, and turn the tide at the critical moment.

We can't go against the general trend and do things like praying man's arms to block the traffic. Since you can't suppress it, then find a way to make friends.

The Koslow family is a rising aristocrat after all, and the Earl of Hudson is even smarter, a nouveau riche who is not successful or rampant.

Neither the royal family nor the major forces in the country will see him dominating the southeastern province.

If it crosses the line, even if it is a war, everyone needs to use him, and if he can endure the outbreak, he will settle accounts after the war.

In a sense, the more beautiful Hudson is now, the easier it will be to fall into public criticism after the war.

There has never been a lack of similar negative cases in history. Many legendary heroes have been persecuted, and they are essentially politically immature, putting themselves in a dangerous situation.

You have seen Earl Hudson's political skills. It was impossible for him not to see such an obvious thing.

It is also the best choice for him to maintain the pattern of the two powers in the southeastern province. One step further, and the king would not be able to sleep.

Even if there are gains in the war, the expansion of the Koslow family cannot be in the southeastern province. In this regard, all major families in the country are the same.

If the kingdom has no restrictions on big nobles, I am afraid that there are big families across provinces and counties everywhere. Where is there room for small and medium nobles?

At this moment, Hudson is asked to take action. In addition to deliberately giving a favor, another reason is that the origin of this group of pirates is unknown.

In case there is a plan by a certain big force behind it, there can be one more person to share the hatred. After all, Dragon Knight's sense of existence is much stronger than ours. "

After hearing Earl Pierce's explanation, Viscount Cayo blushed. He never expected that such a seemingly ordinary invitation would hide so many things behind it.

No wonder the Koslow family and the Dalton family, who are in the southeastern province, compete for a while and cooperate for a while, making people puzzled.

After sorting it out like this, everything is explained. When neither of the two major forces has the ability to swallow the other in one gulp, compromise in the struggle becomes an inevitable choice.

…

The Principality of Omega, as one of the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland, unfortunately stood in the way of the orc army and became the first country to start the defense of the capital since the outbreak of the Continental War.

The territory fell so quickly, it is not the nobles of the Principality of Omega who are waste. In fact, the aristocrats who can come out to open up a foundation are all the elites of this era.

Small countries are superimposed on emerging immigrant countries. The combination of two objective factors determines the tragic lifeline of the Principality of Omega.

The battle to defend the capital started early, because the country is flat and the only strong city defense fortress is the capital.

The development time is too short. There are not even a few cities in the entire principality, and the noble castles are all under construction, so there is no condition to stick to it.

There was no sign in advance, and no one knew that the mainland war would break out so suddenly.

Caught off guard, he was brought into the war, which put a lot of pressure on the Principality of Omega.

Personally inspecting the defenses on the city wall, Baird I, who was physically and mentally exhausted, sighed secretly.

Since he took the throne, he hasn't had a good day.

First, he was busy preparing for the establishment of the government to organize immigration, and then he got up early and took the people to open up wasteland and start a business. Unexpectedly, just as the principality was on the right track, the orc army came to kill it again.

If he had known that it would be so sad to be a king, he would have stayed in his hometown and been a rice bug.

There is no medicine for regret in the world. Now is the time of race war, and he cannot be allowed to shrink back.

"When will reinforcements from various countries arrive?"

Baird I asked concerned.

The Principality of Omega has turned all its citizens into soldiers, as long as they are citizens who can carry a knife, they have been incorporated into the army.

However, it is still a dream to stop the orc army with this little power.

"The army of the Seven Nations Alliance has already begun to mobilize, but considering that the orcs may intercept them halfway, we can only act together after the reinforcements from various countries in the mainland gather.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the six countries jointly initiated a proposal to the Alliance, which is currently being discussed in the Human Race Alliance Parliament.

Privately, the seven-nation alliance has also communicated with various countries. The Kingdom of Frankish promised to send 40,000 troops, and the Kingdom of Libya promised to send 35,000 troops...

The Alpha Kingdom has promised to send the largest number of troops, and plans to send an army of 10,000 people to each of our seven countries.

The total strength of the reinforcements promised by the mainland countries is as high as more than 400,000. Coupled with the military power of the Seven Nations Alliance, theoretically speaking, it should be possible to fight the orcs.

However, these are all theoretical. In actual practice, the speed of all countries is very slow, including the Alpha Kingdom, which has always been efficient, and the response speed is not generally slow.

Besides the Alpha Kingdom, the major human nations on the mainland have all been involved in the war. Even if they are willing to send reinforcements, they probably won't be elites.

Judging from the overall situation, the principality is still not optimistic! "

Foreign Minister Bathory said in a deep voice.

Such diplomatic results are not satisfactory. But there is no way, people are selfish.

Everyone promised to send troops, it is for the righteousness of the human race, but the prerequisite is to take care of yourself first.

"It's not only not optimistic, it is clearly not leaving us a way to survive!

If there is no reinforcements, it is only a matter of time before the capital falls.

Now able to defend, that is because the orcs did not attack aggressively, they wanted to win with the least cost.

We have been blocked, and the food reserves in the city can last up to three months.

Once the food runs out, even if the enemy does not attack, we will collapse.

Other countries are fine. For their hegemony, it is natural to abandon us.

What's the matter with the Alpha Kingdom? It's been so procrastinating and standing still. Don't they understand that after the end of our Seven Kingdoms, they will be the next unlucky one? "

Minister of Military Affairs Jeverson said angrily.

In order to defend the capital, they were forced to take measures to fortify the walls and clear the country, and gathered all the troops from the whole country. The influx of a large number of people directly led to the rapid consumption of food.

When the supply is cut off, the food in the city is one grain, and one grain is missing.

They didn't consider this issue before, that's because they didn't think they could last three months under the full attack of the orc army.

The orcs slowed down their offensive intensity, and the food problem, which was not considered at first, has now become the source of the crisis.

"I can answer this question for you, and it can be summed up in two words—Qianliang!

The Alpha Kingdom has not yet come out of the last war, even if they want to send a large-scale army, they still cannot afford the money and food for the expedition to the grassland.

Anyway, the life and death of the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland has nothing to do with them. Maybe they are still cultivating enemies for themselves if they work hard to rescue them. It is better to let us and the orcs consume.

What's more, the enemies they need to consider are not only orcs, but also ancient survivors and elves.

Standing in their position, maybe letting the orcs destroy us and fighting the orcs at the gate of our house is the best choice! "

Prime Minister Cameron said indifferently.

Only the head of the family knows that firewood, rice, oil and salt are expensive. The Continental War broke out only two months ago, and the Principality of Omega is about to run out of food.

The Alpha Kingdom, which has fought for several years in a row, can imagine the economic situation. Decades of accumulation have been wiped out, and a whole lot of debt is owed.

Another million-army expedition, I am afraid that before defeating the orcs, the Alpha Kingdom will be dragged down by the huge consumption of logistics supplies.

It's useless to know that the seven grassland countries are currently self-sufficient, and it is still difficult to provide logistics for the army at all.

When all countries send troops to reinforce, they must bring their own food and supplies. At most, they organize manpower to help transport them.

"You don't need to be too pessimistic. In view of the special situation we are facing, the Human Race Alliance Council specially approved: We can evacuate in an orderly manner and resist steadily.

Of course, an orderly evacuation exists only in theory. Once they leave the protection of the city, they will be sent to the orc army to be slaughtered.

Now protect the city first, and after two or three months, organize a breakout on the grounds of running out of food, which is an explanation to all parties. "

Batory said pretending to be calm.

Emerging combined countries lack sufficient centripetal force. But no matter what, it is still a country, and only in this country can they occupy a high position.

Once you choose to evacuate, no one knows when you will be able to take back your homeland. Maybe it's after the continental war, or maybe it's the Lifetime series.

Watching the heated discussions among the ministers, Baird I just couldn't stop sighing.

The Principality of Omega, which seems to have a sound system, is essentially a grassroots team that has just been established.

All the people present are from prominent backgrounds, even if the principality is destroyed, they can still go back to be rice worms.

The power invested in the principality is only a small part of the family behind it, even if it fails, it will not hurt its vitality.

If it is passed on for several generations and the interests are locked in the principality, it will definitely be a different scene at this moment.

…

"Ministry of Foreign Affairs, send people to communicate with the Alpha Kingdom and try to get reinforcements as much as possible.

The Alliance of Seven Nations also needs to urge it. Even if they dare not send troops to rescue, they can make some noise to cover our breakout! "

After finishing speaking, Baird I turned and left with a wave of his sleeves.

Intuition told him that once he withdrew from the Principality of Omega, his role as king would be over.

Even if it is restored in the future, nothing will happen to him.

From the attitude of the officials, it can be seen that the relationship between the monarch and his ministers is purely patchwork, and there is no loyalty at all.

The little prestige of the monarch that was painstakingly managed has long since disappeared with the continuous defeat of the war.
Chapter 395:
The King Chapter 395: Sophistication of the world (leader plus more)

On the holy mountain, looking at the appeal letter in his hand, Pius VII was secretly worried.

Although he was responsible for the outbreak of the continental war, it was also due to the development of the international situation, and the specific time when the war broke out was not under his control.

At least at the end of the war against the orcs, Pius VII did not know that the continental war would break out so soon.

Otherwise, he would not spend a lot of money to put his nominal nephew and actual son on the throne.

Although he was an illegitimate child, that was also his most important son.

It's not that Pius VII broke the secular concept, it's mainly because the Church of Dawn stipulates that the Pope does not marry.

Without a legal son, the relationship between father and son can only be satisfied by illegitimate sons.

At first, he thought about letting his son succeed the pope, but later, considering that the operation was too difficult, it happened that the appearance of the Seven Kingdoms of the Prairie made him see another option.

The pope cannot be hereditary, but the king has always been hereditary. Instead of staying to fight for the uncertain Pope, it is better to take the throne passed down from generation to generation.

Even though he said he wanted to restore the glory of the Holy See, in fact Pius VII knew better than anyone that the Holy See could not return to the past.

"What do you think of the request for help from the Seven Kingdoms of the Prairie?"

Pius VII frowned and asked.

The Holy See is not his own Holy See. If you want to send troops to rescue, you must get the support of the major factions within the Holy See.

It is not difficult to achieve this. The son of the pope is the king, and the sons of the faction leaders are also big lords, and then there may be small and medium lords.

In a sense, the Kingdom of Light is a replica of the Holy See. All are tailor-made positions, which are almost impossible.

The aftereffect is the fighting power of the Kingdom of Light, which may have stretched a little bit. There are too many children of the second and third generations, and the will to work hard is not so strong.

Of course, they also have their own advantages, and the resources invested by their parents are more generous.

Judging from the data on paper, the Kingdom of Light ranks first among the Seven Kingdoms of the Grasslands in terms of population, economy, army, and number of masters.

"Your Majesty, the Kingdom of Light among the Seven Prairie Kingdoms is an important part of our layout in the Northern Continent. It cannot be easily abandoned unless it is absolutely necessary.

In order to spread the glory of the Lord of Dawn to the mainland again, we must urge the Terran Alliance to take immediate action.

If the parliament fails to pass, let the Kingdom of Light temporarily give up most of its territory and choose dangerous areas to hold on to.

Send an elite army to help them keep at least one stronghold, and after the victory in the continental war, they will join forces with other countries to help them regain their lost ground. "

Lord Sauron said righteously.

Typical private use of public equipment, but no one expressed objection. After all, this is not the first time a similar operation has happened. The previous large-scale support for the Kingdom of Light was also paid by the Holy See.

Compared to many joint-stock countries, the Holy See is a proper private enterprise. There is only the Lord of Dawn as the boss, and everyone present is just senior wage earners.

Although the Lord of Dawn has not shown up for many years, many people have regarded the Holy See as their own private property, but they still have to consider the issue of faith and cannot truly turn religion into their home.

"There is no problem sending troops, but the orcs are a group of lunatics, who just ended a war and jumped out so impatiently.

If you want to help the Kingdom of Light defend a stronghold, you must not only consider military issues, but more importantly, logistics.

The only large port on the prairie is currently under the control of the Farland Kingdom. If we want to transport materials there, the closest route is to transfer there.

To keep the Kingdom of Light, this port must also be kept. This requires the joint efforts of all countries, and it is too difficult for our family alone! "

After listening to Gu Lei's analysis, everyone's faces were ugly. It can be seen from the map that keeping the logistics line is actually more troublesome than keeping the Kingdom of Light.

The importance of large ports is self-evident. In the last war, all countries in the mainland used this port to transport strategic materials and completed the strategic strike against the orc empire.

After suffering a loss, it is impossible for the orc not to learn a lesson. As long as those in power are not stupid, they will try their best to take this port.

If you want to keep the port, a **** battle is inevitable.

If the scene is accidentally magnified and the main force of the orc army is attracted, then the Alpha Kingdom will be in vain.

For the sake of a bright kingdom, whether it is worth investing so many resources or not, everyone weighed in their hearts.

"Send 50,000 reinforcements first to help the Kingdom of Light stabilize people's hearts. Before the war is over, send as much supplies as possible to the Kingdom of Light.

No matter what you choose in the end, the battle to defend the Kingdom of Light must be fought. "

Pius VII said helplessly.

Now is no longer the era when the Holy See dominates everything, and they must abide by the rules of the game prevailing on the mainland.

It is undoubtedly the best choice to defend a stronghold, preserve the legal authority of the Kingdom of Light, and lay the foundation for the later counterattack to regain lost ground.

Losing the foundation organization government-in-exile, waiting for the post-war Terran Alliance to support the restoration is also an option, but this must be recognized by all parties.

The criteria for recognition are very simple: look at the strength of resistance during the war.

Especially for a newly established country like the Kingdom of Light, it is even more necessary to perform well at this time. If you don't show an impressive record, you won't be able to convince the public.

…

Similar scenes were staged across the continent at the same time. The mainland dignitaries who have the spare capacity to provide support are weighing whether to continue to invest in the prairie.

In contrast, the countries threatened by the elves and the ancient survivors are much more miserable.

Although the mainland nobles belong to one family, they have been independent for too long after all, and the blood relationship is almost zero.

Even if it is the same family, there is still a little love left, far less close than the sons, grandsons, and brothers who have just been separated from the Seven Kingdoms of the Grassland.

There is no affection, purely from the perspective of interests, everyone seems to have not seen their appeal letter.

Except for the verbal promise to send troops to aid, there is no real action at all.

The pressure gradually spread to the countries of the Northern Continent through the Human Race Alliance Parliament. The central and southern countries can ignore it, but their neighbors cannot sit idly by.

Let the frontline countries collapse, and the flames of war will soon be on their own heads, and no one can be alone.

After confirming that the Terran Alliance could not be counted on, all countries turned their attention to the Alpha Kingdom, waiting for the leader of the Northern Continent to come up with a plan.

As one of the core members of the Kingdom's military, Hudson also obtained first-hand information. Even if he was far away from the royal capital, he could still feel the anguish of the princes and ministers at the moment.

To send troops or not to send troops is completely a dilemma. Even if they had made a wait-and-see decision before, due to the current situation and international pressure, they had to make a new choice.

The fact that no meeting was held to discuss it again is enough to prove that the high-level leaders of the kingdom are responsible, and they have endured the pressure.

If you know it, you know it, so Hudson will not come out to take responsibility. In the case of uncertain future development, any decision may be wrong.

Take the results of the previous aristocratic meeting as the decision, and everyone can bear it together if there is a problem. If you change your decision without authorization, any problems that arise will be your own responsibility.

Habitually destroying the documents, Hudson continued to be busy with things in the territory like a normal person.

"Lord Earl, Viscount Cayo is visiting."

Tom's voice sounded in his ears, and Hudson smiled slightly and said, "Please ask him to rest in the living room, and I'll be there soon."

Intuition told him that the previous plan had worked. I just don't know the result of the naval battle, who will win and who will lose in the end.

…
